N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.207002920: Hunt me down a new branch! Bring me a tarnished!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.207802000: ...I am the Lord of all that is Golden...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.207802030: ...To our home, bathed in rays of gold...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.209903000: Miquella is mine and mine alone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.209904010: To my blood, to our coming dynasty.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.209905000: Ahh, I can see it, as clear as day!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213001010: No matter, it's all the same.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213001020: Lay out your arms. Let's get smithing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213002010: No matter. Lay out your arms.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213003000: Back already? Can't get enough, eh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213010020: No matter. It's all the same.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213020000: I see you've noticed the chains.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213020010: Nothing special. I'm a prisoner, and these are my chains.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213020020: I'm trapped by the Hold, undying, smithing for you fools.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213020030: That's all there is to it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213021000: Nah, don't read too much into it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213021020: My being a prisoner is no fault of yours.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213021040: Despite my differences, the weapons get stronger, all the same. Given time, technique never fails.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213021050: Besides, it helps me forget. The sheer terror of her...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213022000: Like the look of that whetstone knife, do you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213022020: You're welcome to take it. Go ahead.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213030020: Of a challenger, who's felled his mark.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213030021: Of a challenger, who's felled her mark.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213030030: Fine and well. Now, lay out your arms.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213040000: Your divinity, have mercy, and grant me forgiveness.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213040010: The road is yet long. A god is not easily felled.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213040020: But one day, without fail, you will have your wish.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213040030: So please, grant me forgiveness, Queen Marika...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213041000: Those words were not meant for you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213041010: I may be prisoner to you Tarnished lot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213041020: But my prayers are mine and mine alone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213041030: Good. I'll be more careful too.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213041040: Well, I've had my say. I'll be more careful, too.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213042020: I'll be doing my job, same as ever.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213050010: She's crestfallen, and can scarcely swing a blade,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213050020: but she has a gift for spirit tuning.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213050030: I saw another one like her, long ago.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213050040: Their eyes share the same hue.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213052000: Are you out of your mind?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213052010: Who'd stay with an ugly brute who only knows how to smith?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213052020: Absurd. And besides, she'd never agree to it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213053010: I don't doubt you, but I know when something's too good to be true.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213060010: She has a gift for spirit tuning.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213060020: So I told her everything I know.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213060030: I'm indebted to a spirit tuner I met long ago.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213060040: It was all I could do to honour her.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213070000: The girl has come a long way.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213070010: As ever, time and technique have made her stronger.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213070030: An imprisoned monster does not deserve an apprentice, or a daughter.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213070040: But at times, that's precisely what she feels like to me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213070050: I've gone soft. And it isn't easy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213080010: I need to do better than this! This'll never kill a god.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213080020: I can do better than this! It needs to slay a bloody god!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213081010: Don't pay me any mind. It's not important.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213090010: Might I have a word, then?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213090020: Your kind are meant to challenge them. To slay them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213090040: If you remain loyal to your calling,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213090050: then no matter what you do, no matter what happens to me,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213090060: I will never cease to smith your weapons.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213090070: Until you have one to slay a god.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213100010: Lay out your arms. Let's get smithing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213101000: Lay out your arms. Let's get smithing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213110020: You came to challenge the demigods, and their god. To slay them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213110030: And as long as you do, I will always smith your weapons.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213110040: It is what I wish. To smith a weapon for you to slay a god.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213111010: She says that now that my chains are broken, I'm free.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213111020: That if I stay here, I will be ruined with the Roundtable.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213111040: What use have I for freedom now?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213111050: I smith weapons to slay a god.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213111060: I have lived, and will die, doing so, upon this spot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213120010: I've done it! A weapon to slay a god!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213120020: Oh, you have my deepest gratitude.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213120030: Thanks to you, my wish is granted.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213120040: Now wield it, and kill them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213120060: Queen Marika herself wishes it so.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213121010: Very well. I'll smith another, if needed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213121020: A weapon to slay a god.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213122000: I'll smith as long as you like.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213123000: I'll smith...as long as you like.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213130000: Use my masterpiece to slay a god.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213130010: That is all that I have lived for.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213130020: And my promise to Q-queen Marika.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213130030: But do me a favor, and do look after the girl.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213131000: I can't hold on much longer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213131010: I'm going the way of the R-roundtable...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213131020: It was a great honor to smith your weapons during my time here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213131030: Allow me to c-call you this, just once, before it ends.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213131040: My lord, f-for that is what you are.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213140010: Oh, I must be a blacksmith.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213141000: Could you tell me what happened?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213141010: Why is the Roundtable burning, in ruins?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213141020: Why does that girl weep for me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.213141030: Have I forgotten something of dire importance?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.214900010: Let us devour the gods, together!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.214901000: Now, we can devour the gods, together!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.214902000: O shapers of gods, meddlers in fortune.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.214902010: I do not abide! By your suffocating Order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.214905000: No one will hold me captive.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216002010: KalÃ© send you, did he? Ever the bloody busybody.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216002020: Hmm. Maybe to him, you don't seem so strange.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216002030: The name's Blaidd. I'm looking for a man who goes by "Darriwil".
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216002040: He fled somewhere nearby. Or so I've heard.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216002050: Come tell me if you find him before I do.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216002060: I can offer you ample reward.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216003000: Darriwil is nothing but a traitor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216003010: And in need of a fitting end to his tale.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216010010: Rotting in a cell is no true justice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216010020: No, this is where it ends for you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216020010: Had to work for it, but it's done.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216020020: Don't say I'm not a man of my word. Here's your prize.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216021010: If you venture north to Raya Lucaria, and come across a venerable blacksmith who's a little on the large side...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216021030: And he'll be sure to treat you right.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216021040: I owe you one, I reckon.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216030020: Glad to have you in the service of mistress Ranni.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216030050: The eternal city of Nokron lies somewhere at the bottom of this land.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216030060: I'm planning to go below through the well in the Mistwood.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216030070: See if I can't find the road to Nokron from there...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216030080: See if I can't find the road to Nokron from there...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216031000: Ah. I heard about you. Good to finally meet.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216031010: Name's Blaidd, sworn sword to mistress Ranni.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216031040: I'm situated in Limgrave right now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216031050: The eternal city of Nokron lies somewhere at the bottom of this land.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216031060: I'm planning to go below through the well in the Mistwood.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216031070: See if I can't find the road to Nokron from there...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216032000: I'm going below through the well in the Mistwood.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216032010: See if I can't find the road to Nokron...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216040010: Apologies mate, but I don't have much to report.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216040020: I can see bloody Nokron, right above me, but I'm absolutely stumped.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216040030: I've tried all the gateways, to no avail...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216040050: I recall that spiteful little rat acting like he knew something...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216040060: Let's give him a squeeze. Show him just how sharp my teeth are...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216041000: I jest, I wouldn't go that far.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216041010: Besides, I should check on some things here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216041020: Leave this place to me. You just do what you feel is right.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216041030: If either of us learns anything, we tell the other. Right?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216043000: Leave this place to me. You just do what you feel is right.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216043010: If either of us learns anything, we tell the other. Right?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216043020: And if we reach a dead end, I suppose we go back to the source.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216043030: Seluvis rarely gives a straight answer, the first time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216050010: So Ranni's fate is kept in stasis by Starscourge Radahn...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216050020: That reminds me of something I heard.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216050030: There's a festival being held at the castle on the southern edge of the Caelid Wilds, east of Limgrave.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216050040: It's a festival of combat. And I heard...that you can fight Radahn himself. He who was once called the strongest of all the demigods...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216050050: Maybe it's just a coincidence, but I think it's worth investigating.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216050060: I'll be on my way to this festival of Radahn then...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216051000: You're coming too, right? To Radahn's festivities...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216051010: I'll meet you at Redmane Castle in Caelid.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216051020: The way ahead is pleasingly simple. We fight, sword and fang.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216052010: Leave this place to me. You just do what you feel is right.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216052020: If either of us learns anything, we tell the other. Right?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216053010: So Ranni's fate is kept in stasis by Starscourge Radahn...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216053020: And there's a festival of war being held at Redmane Castle in Caelid,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216053030: where you can fight the man himself, once the strongest of the demigods.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216053040: It's all coming together. Seems like Iji was on to something.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216053050: I'll be on my way to this festival of Radahn then...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216060000: Ah, there you are. Took your sweet time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216060020: The players are all made up, and waiting for the curtain...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216060030: Let's give them a show to remember, eh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216060040: Just don't you go dying on me. For Ranni's sake, too.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216061000: Once more into the fray together, eh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216061010: Heh. This might even be fun.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216062010: Heh. Let's see what you're made of.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216063000: Ah, thought I might find you here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216063010: I must admit I was a little worried. We missed our meeting.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216063020: But it looks like you're still in one piece, eh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216063030: You must have heard by now, right?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216063040: That Starscourge Radahn holds Ranni's fate in stasis.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216063050: But once he's out of the way, it will spring back into motion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216063060: So now, we stand against the demigod once known as the strongest of them all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216063070: The way ahead is pleasingly simple. We fight, sword and fang.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216064010: Seems we're fated to keep crossing paths.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216064020: Now, we find ourselves at a festival of combat, pitted against Radahn, once the strongest of the demigods.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216064030: The way ahead is pleasingly simple. A path forged by sword and fang.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216065000: Mm... As a fellow combatant, allow me to introduce myself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216065020: Now, we find ourselves pitted against Radahn, once the strongest of the demigods.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216065030: The way ahead is pleasingly simple; a path forged by sword and fang.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216066000: Hm. Nothing to do but wait. Until the festival begins.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216080000: Ah, good. I was waiting for you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216080010: What a sick way to fight, eh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216080020: The glory of the clash is shared, by Radahn and you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216080030: And hah! Did you see that, afterwards?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216080040: A falling star, right before our eyes!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216080050: I can't fathom how Radahn was holding back something of that scale.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216080060: He was a living legend, if ever I saw one.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216080070: And, the path has now been cleared.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216080080: To Nokron, where Ranni's fate will be decided.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216080090: Let's meet where the falling star bit the earth.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216080100: We'll take up our swords once more. For mistress Ranni.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216081000: Let's meet where the falling star bit the earth.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216081010: And we'll go into battle again, side by side.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216081020: My only purpose is to fight for Ranni's fate, sword and fang.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216081030: The curtain's rising...on the final act.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216082000: Hmph, what a sick way to fight, eh mate.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216082010: The glory of the clash is shared, by Radahn and you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216082020: And then a falling star, right before our eyes!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216082030: I can't fathom how Radahn was holding back something of that scale.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216082040: He was a living legend, if ever I saw one.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216083010: The wheel of fate has been set into motion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216083020: If it's on the cards, I'd be glad to meet again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216084000: If it's on the cards, I'd be glad to meet again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216100030: Told me I'd bring nought but bale to Lady Ranni.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216100040: But there's no chance that could happen.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216100050: I'm part of her being. Her very shadow...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216100060: I thought old Iji knew as much...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216100070: Honestly, I don't know what's going on anymore...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216101000: I don't understand. Why would Iji do this...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216101010: I could never intend harm to Lady Ranni. What's he thinking...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216110010: I'm going to see mistress Ranni, now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216110020: I don't know what came over old Iji,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216110030: but even if the odds are slim, I need to check the mistress is safe.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216110040: Now, Ranni can finally set in motion
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216110050: the fight against her fate she's dreamt of for so long.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216111000: I'm going to see mistress Ranni, now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216111010: I don't know what came over old Iji,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216111020: but even if the odds are slim, I need to check the mistress is safe.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216120010: No. I'm part of her very being!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216802010: Time to douse your little flame.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216803010: Better to put you down now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216806020: What harm can be done...to a shadow?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216808010: You think me a bringer of bale as well?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216808020: Fine. I am Ranni's shadow and it's for her that I fight.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216808030: Whatever any of you might call me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216809000: I am no bringer of bale.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216809010: I must return to Ranni's side.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216810010: Why... Why am I...bale to Ranni?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216811000: Didn't I say? No harm can befall a shadow.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216812010: Wherever mistress Ranni goes, I follow.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.216812020: You are a danger. You die here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218001010: Proud Tarnished warrior. Before you kill me, let me speak.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218001020: I can aid you. Please, just hear me out.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218002010: I am Asimi. My true form is that of a silver tear.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218002020: I am a simple being who can assume the shapes of other living things.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218002030: But now, I've gained knowledge. I speak, and ponder, and...live in fear of death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218002040: O, mighty Tarnished warrior, I beg of you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218002050: Let me keep the life I've been granted. In exchange, I offer you power.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218003010: Now, set your lips upon me, and breathe in deep.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218003020: I will live inside of you, and grant you strength untold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218004000: Onward, to our glorious future, my host...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218005000: You won't listen to me, will you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218005010: It's such a pity. I had a feeling you would become...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218006000: Please, proud Tarnished warrior, I beg you reconsider.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218006010: The gifts I can bestow you in life far outstrip those which could be plundered from my corpse.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218006020: Please, can't you find it in your heart to trust me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218007010: But you still haven't killed me, have you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218007020: Do you wish to think it over? Then I will wait.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218007030: For as long as it takes for you to trust me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218008000: Proud Tarnished Warrior, have you made up your mind?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218008010: I can grant you power, if you let me live.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218010000: My lord host, do you hear that?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218010010: The sound of water. The river that flows in my home, the Eternal City.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218010020: Good lord host, I beg you, we must see the Eternal City.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218010030: To discover the ancient wonders of the stars. A wellspring of strength.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218020000: My lord host, great lord host.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218020010: May I ask something of you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218020020: A chalice is close by, the cradle of my kind...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218020030: Would you mind finding it for me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218020040: Mm, you should find the chalice...and drink it dry.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218020050: Ahh, my lord host. I am terribly parched.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218020060: The chalice will quench my thirst, rejuvenate my flesh, and allow me to grant you further strength.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218020070: Please, my lord host. It is my only desire.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218021000: Bless this brook of sustenance. My lord host...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218030000: My lord host, great lord host.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218030010: A tear chalice lies in these lands, too.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218030020: A tear chalice lies in these lands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218030040: Please, search out this most sacred chalice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218030050: It's suffused with the blessed wonders of the stars...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218030060: It will allow us to become a perfect whole.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218040010: Please, drink every last drop from the mother chalice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218040020: So that we may form a perfect whole.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218041020: I'm still so very, very parched.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218041030: In the other Eternal City, there's a cradle chalice to be found.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218041040: And if you were to drink the entirety of that one, first...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218050020: There is nothing to fear. I will merely follow in your footsteps.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218050030: Living only as you would have yourself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218050040: And I vow, that when I perfect your form.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218060010: I was you, and only you. We were one...together.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218060020: Please, I only want to live...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218070020: You could have become Elden Lord, and I could have become Sovereign Eternal, eventually.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218070030: If you hadn't found me, we both could have been Lords.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.218803010: My lord host, worthiest of lords...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.219001040: No secrets lie with me, not a one.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.219002000: Wait, then, you're not one of them?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.219002040: I am Albus. An Albinauric, as you can see.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.219002050: We're finished. The whole village is finished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.219002060: The cursemongers have destroyed everything. No one that remains has their wits about them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.219002070: I beg you. Would you look after this medallion?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.219002080: You must keep it out of the cursemongers' hands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.219002090: And if you should meet the young Albinauric Latenna,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.219002100: then please, give it to her.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.219003000: A chosen land awaits us Albinaurics.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.219003010: Miquella's city, far to the north, a place called Eburion, where we are conferred eternal grace.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.219003020: The medallion is the key that leads to the city.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.219003030: It's only a quaint treasure, for we who cannot make the journey.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.219003040: But for dear Latenna, it is needed. To fulfil her purpose.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.219004000: My legs will soon fade, and with them, my life.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.219004010: Alas, this is the immovable fate of all Albinaurics.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.219004030: If only I could have gazed upon it, even once. The great chalk buttress of Eburion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.219801010: We have caused you no harm!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.219803000: I will never give this up.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220002000: Oh my stars I'm so happy to see you!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220002010: I am Alexander, also known as the Iron Fist. And as you can see, I'm stuck here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220002020: Please, can you help me out of this?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220002040: Just give me a good smack from the rear, with something nice and big.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220002050: And I'll pop clean out. I'm sure!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220002060: Don't dally. No no, there's no need to fret, I'm very well trained.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220002070: Give it your all, I say!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220004000: S-stop please! That's a little too rough for me, friend.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220004010: You'll crack me in half, like that! A little more gently, gently, please.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220006000: Ahh! Well played, good sir. Well played!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220006001: Ahh! Well played, good lady. Well played!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220006010: Though that mighty wallop of yours almost spelt the end of me!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220006030: Well, I'm out now, and that's what counts.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220006040: I thank you, and as a token of my appreciation, I'd like you to have this.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220007000: Once again, the pleasure is mine. I am the warrior jar known as Alexander. Iron Fist Alexander, in fact.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220007010: I journey to the east, where I intend to further my education in the ways of war.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220007020: Beyond these lands lie the scarlet rot-blighted Caelid Wilds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220007030: And upon their southern edge is Redmane Castle, in which a festival of combat is being held.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220007040: I'd heard whispers of such festivities before...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220007050: Doesn't the notion set your breast aflutter!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220008010: No no. I apologise. Don't you worry about a thing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220008020: Despite my appearance, I am but a chip off a greater jar. I'll pop out eventually, just you wait.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220009000: Ah, what's that look, good sir?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220009001: Ah, what's that look, good lady?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220009010: Are you willing to help me out after all?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220010000: Come on, give me a good smack from behind with something nice and big.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220010010: I'll pop clean out. I'm sure, of it!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220011010: Just keeping clobbering away at the old behind!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220011020: Put those doubts to rest, I'll be just fine. I'm very well trained.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220011030: Give it your all, I say!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220012000: G-good gosh, stop, please! That's my face!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220012010: Smack me from the other end! The other end!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220013010: To Redmane Castle on the southern edge of the scarlet rot-blighted Caelid Wilds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220013020: I've heard there's to be a festival held there.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220014000: G-good gosh, stop, please! That's my lid!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220020000: Oh, I hadn't expected to see your face again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220020010: Are you heading to the festival of combat, too?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220020020: Oh, no need to be coy with me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220020030: Judging by the fine wallop you gave the old backside earlier, I would venture you're something of a warrior yourself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220020040: The mere thought of such a festival gets the blood pumping, eh!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220020050: Now, now, according to my calculations, passing through this road should lead us to the Caelid Wilds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220020060: But however you slice it, it seems we've reached a dead end.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220020070: I'm sorry to have raised your hopes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220020080: It seems my calculations must have been off...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220021000: I was created to be a warrior vessel.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220021010: Many great warriors reside within me, ever dreaming of becoming a great champion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220021020: It's my destiny. And the reason for which I quest.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220021030: It is my ordeal, you could say. To test myself, to better myself, to fell ever greater foes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220021040: And then, one day, we'll be a single great champion. The greatest of them all!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220021050: What do you think, eh? How do you rate my chances?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220022000: Ah, if it isn't a Tarnished warrior.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220022020: I'm heading to the festival at Redmane Castle, on the southern edge of the scarlet rot-blighted Caelid Wilds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220022030: Oh, no need to be coy with me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220022040: I can tell from your bearing you're skilled in the arts of combat.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220022050: Ah, yes, the mere thought of such a festival gets the blood pumping, eh!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220022060: I am the warrior jar, Iron Fist Alexander.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220022070: And according to my calculations, passing through this road should lead us to the Caelid Wilds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220022080: But however you slice it, it seems we've reached a dead end.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220022090: I'm sorry to have raised your hopes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220022100: It seems my calculations must have been off...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220030010: Good sir, where did you spring from?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220030011: Good lady, where did you spring from?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220030020: This was supposed to be a dead end, I'm sure of it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220030030: What's going on here? A door, from thin air!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220030040: Well, stranger things happen at sea, or so I'm told, but onward! To the Caelid Wilds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220030050: I suppose my calculations were right all along. You should head this way as well, friend.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220031010: The esteemed warrior. Where did you spring from?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220031020: This was supposed to be a dead end, I'm sure of it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220031030: What's going on here? A door, from thin air!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220031040: Well, stranger things happen at sea, or so I'm told, but onward! To the Caelid Wilds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220031050: Gosh, that dead-end had me rather stumped!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220032020: This was supposed to be a dead end, I'm sure of it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220032030: What's going on here? A door, from thin air!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220032040: Well, stranger things happen at sea, or so I'm told, but onward I shall go.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220032050: I am the warrior jar, Iron Fist Alexander.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220032060: I was heading to Redmane Castle on the southern edge of the scarlet rot-blighted Caelid Wilds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220032070: Where a festival is being held. Until I was stumped by that dead end!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220033010: To the festival at Redmane Castle on the southern edge of the scarlet rot-blighted Caelid Wilds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220033020: Doesn't the thought just set your heart aflutter!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220040010: Indeed, I thought I might find you here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220040020: By the by, do you know for whom this festival is being held?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220040030: Well, it is none other than General Radahn himself!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220040040: To think, I could face a great champion of the Shattering, a demigod in the flesh...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220040050: In truth I quiver at the thought, such is his frightful repute.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220040060: But! The fear simply assures me the ordeal is worth undertaking!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220040070: Now, be sure to get a good vantage, my friend.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220040080: I, Iron Fist Alexander, do hereby vow to unflinchingly brave this ordeal.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220041000: Ah, if it isn't a Tarnished warrior.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220041010: I am the warrior jar, Iron Fist Alexander. The pleasure is mine.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220041020: Do you know for whom this festival is being held?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220041030: Well, it is none other than General Radahn himself!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220041040: To think, I could face a great champion of the Shattering, a demigod in the flesh...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220041050: In truth I quiver at the thought, such is his frightful repute.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220041060: But! The fear simply assures me the ordeal is worth undertaking!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220041070: Be sure to get a good vantage, my friend.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220041080: I, Iron Fist Alexander, do hereby vow to unflinchingly brave this ordeal.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220042000: Be sure to get a good vantage, my friend.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220042010: I, Iron Fist Alexander, do hereby vow to unflinchingly brave this ordeal.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220050010: It was a battle marvellously fought. You are well and truly a champion, friend.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220050020: I, on the other hand, am nothing but a crock.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220050030: One hit was all it took to crack me, and for my insides to come spilling out...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220050040: After that, I hid like a coward.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220050050: And as such, I can hardly stand to face one such as you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220051000: ...But don't you think I've given up just yet.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220051010: As luck would have it, there's a veritable mountain of warriors' bodies right here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220051020: If I can just squeeze this bunch down inside me, I'll be a mighty warrior again in no time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220051030: And you know... The bodies found here are exceedingly fine.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220051040: Who could expect any less from the very warriors who fought in the Shattering, the greatest of all wars!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220051050: Just you wait and see, friend. I'll grow even stronger!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220051060: Just you wait, when next we meet!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220052000: Alright lads, I'm going to take you on a little journey.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220052010: You'll all be inside me, and be part of me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220052020: From now on, we're all in it together.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220052030: So let's all of us dream big.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220053000: The bodies found here are exceedingly fine.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220053010: Who could expect any less from the very warriors who fought in the Shattering, the greatest of all wars!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220053020: Just you wait and see, friend. I'll grow even stronger!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220053030: Just you wait, when next we meet!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220061000: Ahh, hello! How nice it is to see a friendly face!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220061010: As you can surmise, I've got myself stuck in another hole.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220061020: Would you mind helping me out, again?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220061030: My thanks in advance, I know you're the man for the job!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220061031: My thanks in advance, I know you're the woman for the job!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220061040: You know what to do, hm?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220061050: Give me a good smack from behind with something nice and big.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220061060: Don't worry about my wound sustained at the festival.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220061070: I'm stuck back together good and proper!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220063000: P-please! Wait. I have a terrible feeling about this!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220063010: Would you stop hitting me for a minute!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220064010: No no. I apologise. Don't you worry about a thing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220064020: Despite my appearance, I am but a chip off a greater jar. I'll pop out eventually, just you wait.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220065010: Are you willing to help me out after all?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220066000: Come on, give me a good smack from behind with something nice and big!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220067000: I can feel my lower half is stuck on something.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220067010: I don't think you can get me out just by hitting me, this time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220067030: Let's think... Perhaps there's a way to slide me out a little more smoothly...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220067040: What if I could somehow be made slippery, or somesuch?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220068010: Let's think... Perhaps there's a way to slide me out a little more smoothly...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220068020: What if I could somehow be made slippery, or somesuch?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220069000: Ahh, hello! How nice it is to see a friendly face!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220069010: As you can surmise, I've got myself stuck in a hole.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220069020: Would you mind helping me out?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220072000: My thanks! To you and your razor-sharp wits.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220072010: As a token of my thanks, I'd like you to have this.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220073000: Deary me, I'm oilier than a toad!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220073010: There were countless oil jars back where I'm from, actually.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220073020: And now I know what it's like to be one of them!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220074000: Yes, indeed, I too have a home.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220074010: Though it is one to which I have vowed not to return.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220074020: So, I thought I might look out from atop the cliff, but as I drew closer and closer...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220074030: Pow! Wouldn't you know it, I was perfectly stuck in that blasted hole.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220074040: I can feel the warriors inside admonishing me for my mawkishness.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220074050: To walk the path of champions, one cannot cleave to the past!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220074060: I'm headed to the fiery mount in the north.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220074070: I can strengthen myself there, without fear of cracking this vessel.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220074080: I will forge myself anew in its flames!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220075000: I'm headed to the fiery mount in the north.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220075010: I can strengthen myself there, without fear of cracking this vessel.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220075020: I will forge myself anew in its flames!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220080020: O mountain of fire! Bake me in your flames!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220081010: Ah, good sir, what business might you have in such a place as this?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220081011: Ah, good lady, what business might you have in such a place as this?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220081020: I hardly think you're here to temper yourself with flame, considering that fleshly form of yours.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220081030: Your timing though, is impeccable as ever!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220081040: I've been making just the thing for you on my journey here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220081050: Take it, I'm sure it'll suit you to a tee.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220081060: But oh, it's hardly more than lukewarm here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220081070: I won't be able to temper my body such that it'll never crack again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220081090: There's an old saying I've caught wind of.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220081100: "Above the lofty clouds, the icy giant's peak doth soar, here lieth the flame of ruin, which ever burning roars."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220083010: There's an old saying I've caught wind of.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220083020: "Above the lofty clouds, the icy giant's peak doth soar, here lieth the flame of ruin, which ever burning roars."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220090000: Ah, I see you've finally made it here yourself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220090010: The city hanging in the air is slowly crumbling. What an incredible place we find ourselves.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220090020: But that aside, you're certainly a force to be reckoned with, eh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220090030: I doubt there's a single soul who could've handled that giant, other than you. It was practically a god...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220090040: Of course I count myself, the great Alexander, among the many.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220090050: Which means, I've but one thing to ask of you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220090060: Would you kindly undertake my ordeal?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220090070: Come and tell me when you're ready.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220090080: I've been longing to fight a warrior as accomplished as you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220091000: You are ready then, I take it?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220091020: I am the great jar warrior, Iron Fist Alexander!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220091030: Lend me strength, O warriors within!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220091040: Let us become one champion, together!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220092000: Ah, I see you've finally made it here yourself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220092010: The city hanging in the air is slowly crumbling. What an incredible place we find ourselves.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220092020: But that aside, I can't believe you felled that giant. It was practically a god...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220092030: I doubt there's another soul out there who could've done the same.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220092040: Of course I count myself, the great Alexander, among the many.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220092050: Which means, I've but one thing to ask of you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220092060: Would you kindly undertake my ordeal?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220092070: Come and tell me when you're ready.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220092080: I've been longing to fight a warrior as accomplished as you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220101000: My thanks. I knew you were the stuff of champions.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220101020: I implore you, take what I bequeath...from inside me...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220101030: All vessels are destined to one day break.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220101040: But the great Alexander lived as a warrior to his last!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220102000: Good sir, I can't believe your heart was in it at all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220102001: Good lady, I can't believe your heart was in it at all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220130000: By the gods you are a man of vision!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220130001: By the gods you are a woman of vision!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220130010: This will have me as slippery as a toad.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220130020: I have a good feeling about this, my friend.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220130030: Right! Give me a good smack from behind with something nice and big!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220131010: Just stop a moment, I beg!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220132000: My lower half is stuck on something down there!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220133000: I'll break! I'll break before I'm out!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220134020: I beg! I beg of you!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220140010: I thought I was apt to split in half...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220140020: Mm, I can feel my lower half is stuck on something.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220140030: I don't think you can get me out just by hitting me, this time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220140050: Let's think... Perhaps there's a way to slide me out a little more smoothly...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220140060: W-what if I could somehow be made slippery, or somesuch?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220141010: Just give me a good smack from the rear, with something nice and big.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220141020: And I'll pop clean out. I'm sure!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220141030: Don't worry about my wound sustained at the festival.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220141040: I'm stuck back together good and proper!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220801010: This is no time for games!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220802000: Wait, I see. I see it now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220802010: Humans all lose their wits, eventually.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220803000: Then there's nothing left to say, except...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220810000: A finer battle was never witnessed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220810010: How do you fancy joining the lads inside, eh?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.220820010: Was my whole existence... just a crock?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223001010: Could you help us out, cully?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223001030: Stop pretending you can't see me!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223001040: Why won't anyone look me in the eye?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223001050: I-I'm not that ugly, am I?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223002010: What'd you go and do that for!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223003010: Some clod turned me into a tree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223003020: You were just breaking the spell, weren't you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223003040: I was pushed out of the cave. Told not to come back, not ever.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223003050: Then I ended up as a tree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223004010: When they threw me out of the cave, they took everything I owned,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223004020: and so this is all I have to express my thanks.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223004030: I hope you can forgive me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223004040: Or, if you can afford to wait for a while,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223004050: I could sneak back into the cave, and bring back something of actual value.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223004060: Then I'd be of some real use to you, I reckon.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223005000: Right, but I'll need a moment.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223005010: I-I'm frightened of them... So I have to gather myself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223005020: My knees start knockin'...just thinking about that god-awful cave on the shore...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223010000: Oh, what are you doing here?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223010010: You must leave this place at once. They'll rush in and beat you to a pulp.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223010020: You'll end up just like me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223011000: Wait, is that what I think it is?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223011010: You got it back for me? My sewing needle!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223011030: What made you go and do a thing like that...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223011050: ...and that sewing kit was all I had to remember her by.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223011060: I always wanted to be just like sweet old Mum.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223011070: Then, I suppose I-I can't just curl up and die, can I.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223012020: I always wanted to be a seamster, l-like my mum.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223012030: Then, I suppose I can't just curl up and die, can I.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223020010: Do you remember me? Boc, the demi-human.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223020020: You helped me before, and retrieved my sewing needle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223020040: Allow me to serve you, as your seamster.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223020050: I can't make nothing from scratch, butâ€¦
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223020060: I'm happy to make adjustments to your garments.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223021000: Boc the seamster, at your service, Master.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223021010: Ready to make adjustments to your garments.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223022010: Please, do be safe on your journeys.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223023010: Do you ever...make adjustments to your garb yourself?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223023020: I would, well, rather you let me do the job when possible, please.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223023030: I don't ask anything in return, you know, and, well...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223023040: I am your personal seamster, after all!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223023050: I am your personal seamster, after all!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223030010: Your wardrobe includes the garb of old demigods,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223030020: and I'm afraid I can't make adjustments to them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223030040: That a royal seamster would do them up in a jiffy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223030050: Just wait, master. Before long, I'll be that good, too!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223031000: Is that a gift for my undeserving self?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223031010: Thank you kindly. But what on earth could it...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223031030: Amazing! I've never seen a golden needle, not in all my life!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223031040: With a spectacular royal crest, to boot...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223031050: Are you certain that this is for me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223031060: Oh, I can hardly believe it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223031080: I'll polish my craft enough that I deserve this golden gift!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223031090: I'll be the golden seamster, Boc!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223031100: Now I'll be able to sew anything, even the threads of the demigods!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223032000: Do you think that Mum would be pleased if she knew?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223032010: That I'm as good as any royal seamster, now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223032030: I need to learn how to sew from scratch, like her.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223040000: Master, may I ask you something?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223040010: Would you mind if I called you lord?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223040020: I heard that you and the other Tarnished seek the throne of the Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223040030: Well, I know that you will be the one,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223040040: and you'd make just the manner of kind-hearted lord that I'd wish for.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223040060: Allow me to call you lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223041000: You don't say! Thank you, thank you!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223041030: And please, let I, Boc the seamster, remain at your side.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223042010: Forgive me, for overstepping my bounds. I didn't mean it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223043000: Boc the seamster, at your service, m'lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223043010: Ready to make adjustments to your garments.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223044010: Please, do be safe on your journeys.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223045020: I, oh, I don't really have the words for this...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223045030: But I was so...so dazzled, I felt something stir, in my breast.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223045040: The Erdtree is waiting for you, master.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223045050: I know it, I do. I feel it in my bones.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223046020: I, oh, I don't really have the words for this...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223046030: But I was so...so dazzled, I felt something stir, in my breast.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223046040: The Erdtree is waiting for you, m'lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223046050: I know it, I do. I feel it in my bones.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223046060: O please, take the throne of Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223050000: M'lord... Have you ever wished you might be born again?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223050010: Well, they say that Rennala of Raya Lucaria
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223050020: has the power to help people be reborn.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223050040: Oh, look at me. When you're this ugly...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223050050: well, being reborn? It would hardly make a difference, I'm afraid.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223051020: It can't beâ€¦ For my rebirth?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223051030: But these are precious, are you certain that it's for me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223051060: It was my only wish, that I might honour you with a decent appearance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223052000: M'lord, it shouldn't take me long.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223052010: I'm off to see Rennala of Raya Lucaria.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223052020: I'll be reborn, fresh and new.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223053010: In all honesty, what do you think of me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223053020: Am I fit to serve a lord such as you, in all my ugliness?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223053030: Must I be reborn, no matter what ill fate awaits me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223053050: I don't even have answers to the simplest of questions.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223054000: Master... Have you ever wished you might be born again?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223056000: Master, it shouldn't take me long.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223057020: Am I fit to serve you, master, in all my ugliness?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223060000: Did I just hear my mum speaking?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223060020: Mum was always the only one who said I was beautiful.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223060030: And now, my dear lord let me hear her voice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223060040: Please, if I may dream, just once...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223060050: Do you feel the same way my mum did, m'lord?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223060060: Do you think I'm beautiful, despite these looks?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223061020: I, Boc the seamster, am forever in your service.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223061030: May the throne of Elden Lord be yours.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223062000: No, why on earth would you...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223062010: It was silly of me to ask. Please, forget that I did.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223062020: But I beg, don't renounce me for my appearance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223062030: One day, I'll look every bit the servant.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223065000: Did I just hear my mum speaking?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223065020: Mum was always the only one who said I was beautiful.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223065030: And now, my kind master let me hear her voice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223065040: Please, if I may dream, just once...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223065050: Do you feel the same way my mum did, master?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223065060: Do you think I'm beautiful, despite these looks?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223066020: I, Boc the seamster, am forever in your service.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223067000: No, why on earth would you...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223067010: It was silly of me to ask. Please, forget that I did.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223067020: But I beg, don't renounce me for my appearance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223067030: One day, I'll look every bit the servant.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223100010: Oh no, I can't. It would be wasted on the likes of me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223100020: You should drink it yourself, master.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223100030: I would be far happier knowing you enjoyed it yourself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223101010: Oh no, I can't. It would be wasted on the likes of me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223101020: You should drink it yourself, m'lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223101030: I would be far happier knowing you enjoyed it yourself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223102030: I don't deserve it, but I'll savour every last drop.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223103030: I don't deserve it, but I'll savour every last drop.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223800010: Why'd you go and do that?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223800020: It's because I'm ugly, isn't it?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223801000: Oh, now, you too, is it?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223801010: The story of my rotten life...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223811020: Or is it just...because I'm ugly?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223812010: Master, is that the truth, your heart of hearts? My, oh my...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223813000: Oh, master, what have I done...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223821020: Or is it just...because I'm ugly?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.223822010: M'lord, is that the truth, your heart of hearts? My, oh my...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224001000: Well, look at you. We don't receive many visitors.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224001010: I presume you are a Tarnished. What brings you here?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224010000: Oh, pardon me. It's hardly my place to ask, is it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224010010: I am Iji. A blacksmith who once served the Carian royalsâ€¦
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224010020: An old codger who refuses to retire his rusty hammer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224010030: So, here I am, still quietly plying my trade, on this spot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224010040: Perhaps you'd like a display? These bones are old, but still able.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224011000: Well, it's kind of you to speak to me again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224011010: Then I presume these old bones served their purpose, more or less?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224012000: Brave Tarnished. Here to put my old bones to work again?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224013000: Brave Tarnished. A word of warning, if you please.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224013010: This territory once belonged to the Carian royal family. Their manor lies not far beyond this point.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224013020: When the Raya Lucaria Academy turned on the Carians, the Knights of the Cuckoo descended on this tract.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224013030: After leveling it, they carried on to the manor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224013040: The Carians were taken off guard, but their strength had not waned, and they repelled the knights' onslaught...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224013050: By conjuring an enchanted snare that remains potent to this day.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224013060: That is why I say, Tarnished. Don't go near the manor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224013070: Unless you wish to lie with the corpses of the heedless Knights of the Cuckoo.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224014010: When I'm absorbed in my smithing, I lose sight of all else.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224014020: If you come too close, I'm apt to cause you harm.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224014030: I am, after all, terribly large compared to you, Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224014040: You don't know how hard it is not to break anything while I work.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224016010: Of the enchanted snare that remains at the royal Carian Manor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224016020: Whatever you do, brave Tarnished, stay away from that deathtrap.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224017000: Blaidd actually did that, did he?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224017010: Quite a rare occurrence, for such a guarded soul as he.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224017020: Perhaps he sensed something unusual about you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224017030: At any rate, if you're friendly with Blaidd,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224017040: I've a few more things that might suit you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224017050: I've something else that might suit you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224020000: Oh, so you were the one. Lady Ranni has explained everything.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224020050: The Carian royal family's dedicated blacksmith, and Lady Ranni's war counsellor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224020060: I am told that you are searching for Nokron with Blaidd.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224020070: I will give you whatever guidance I can. And pray, for your success.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224023020: The Carian royal family's dedicated blacksmith, and Lady Ranni's war counsellor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224023030: I am told that you are searching for Nokron with Blaidd.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224023040: I will give you whatever guidance I can. And pray, for your success.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224024000: Oh, then you must be the one. Lady Ranni has explained everything.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224024010: The pleasure is mine. I am Iji.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224030000: I take it you've heard of the Eternal City of Nokstella?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224030010: Well, it has a twin, known as Nokron. The other Eternal City.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224030020: After years of expeditions, we've determined the location of Nokron.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224030030: By going underground through the well in the Mistwood of Limgrave, you can see Nokron up above.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224030040: Only, we've failed to find a path leading to the city.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224030050: Blaidd's made a good go of it, but I'm afraid this has him quite stumped.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224030060: To be honest, I'm not sure where to go from here...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224031010: Ranni's mother, Queen Rennala, approved of him, and they played like siblings from childhood.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224031020: They were always happy to have me tag along, as well.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224031030: When Lady Ranni renounced her flesh, and chose the dark path of the Empyrean,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224031040: Blaidd and I swore allegiance as vassals,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224031050: but none of us will ever forget our earliest days together.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224031060: Promise to look after Blaidd for me, will you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224031070: The man is honest to a fault. But fortunately, now he has you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224032000: Jerren. Now, that's a name I haven't heard for a while.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224032010: Before taking up the banner of General Radahn, he was a guest of the Carian royal family.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224032020: An expert swordsman, to be sure, but ever the eccentric.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224032030: No surprise he'd get wrapped up in some festival.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224032050: How did I not see it before!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224032060: I ought to retire as war counsellor for such a gross oversight!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224032070: Let me explain. The fate of the Carian royal family is guided by the stars.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224032080: As is the fate of Lady Ranni, first heir in the Carian royal line.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224032090: But General Radahn is the conqueror of the stars.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224032100: Who stood up to the swirling constellations, halting their movement in a smashing victory.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224032110: And so, if General Radahn were defeated, the stars would once again resume their movement.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224032130: Perhaps, even, revealing the elusive path. That leads to Nokron.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224033000: My apologies for the misleading words of warning.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224033010: I never imagined that an audience, let alone service to Lady Ranni was in your fate.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224033020: I, for one, should have seen it, but I did not.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224033040: Let us give all that we can of ourselves.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224034000: Let us give all that we can of ourselves.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224035000: Let us give all that we can of ourselves.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224036000: Well, my fellow. How may I serve you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224036010: As war counsellor, or as blacksmith?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224037000: Greetings, my fellow. How can I help?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224039000: Go with Blaidd to the festival grounds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224039010: Should General Radahn be defeated, the stars would once again resume their movement.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224039020: Perhaps revealing the elusive path to Nokron.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224040000: Ah, you've finally come. Blaidd told me everything.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224040010: You've defeated General Radahn, unlocking the stars.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224040020: The General was blighted by scarlet rot and driven to madness, but not long ago he was hailed as the mightiest demigod of them all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224040030: There is no parallel to your achievement. Nor to Lady Ranni's acute judgement of character.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224040040: Thanks to you, Lady Ranni's fate once again stirs, and the path to Nokron has opened.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224040050: Descend underground where the fallen star struck Limgrave.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224040060: And make it yours. The precious treasure of Nokron.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224041000: Oh, Blaidd wanted me to tell you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224041010: Not to bother waiting for him, and head straight to Nokron.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224041020: Blaidd has been given an important task.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224041030: Apparently, a matter of great urgency.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224042010: Descend underground alone where the fallen star struck Limgrave.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224042020: And make it yours. The precious treasure of Nokron.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224042030: So that Lady Ranni may tread the dark path of the Empyrean.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224050000: Now the festival is over, and General Radahn is defeated...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224050020: Though we served different masters, I could see he was truly adept in his role.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224050030: Now the time has come to remind him of an old promise made.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224050040: With the stars of fate set into motion, a certain sorceress is dispossessed of her immortality...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224050050: Finally, we can be rid of a longstanding Carian weed...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224051000: Jerren. Now, that's a name I haven't heard for a while.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224051010: Before taking up the banner of General Radahn, he was a guest of the Carian royal family.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224051020: An expert swordsman, to be sure, but ever the eccentric.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224051040: Jerren and I parted ways long, long ago, yet here he is, playing his part in Lady Ranni's fate.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224051050: I'm afraid I never saw it coming. And I thought myself a capable war counsellor...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224060000: I presume you've spoken with Blaidd?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224060010: Very well. There is something you should know.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224060020: The Two Fingers gave Blaidd to Lady Ranni, as a faithful follower. Her very shadow, incapable of treachery.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224060030: But if Lady Ranni, as an Empyrean, resists being an instrument of the Two Fingers,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224060040: the shadow will go mad, transforming from a follower into a horrid curse.
