N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224060050: But such is his destiny. In such matters, Blaidd's own thoughts hold no weight.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224060060: It pains me so, but he must be neutralised. For Lady Ranni's sake.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224070010: How did he break free from his cell?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224070030: Blaidd became a curse that plagued Lady Ranni, yet even in madness, gave himself to her.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224070040: I've made a grave misjudgment. And I thought myself a capable war counsellor...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224070050: I'll catch up with you soon enough, Blaidd.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224070060: When I do, I only hope you'll accept my apology.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224100000: Oh, so you were the one. Lady Ranni has explained everything.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224100010: You've defeated General Radahn, unlocking the stars.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224100020: A grand reward, justly procured by any measure.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224100040: The Carian royal family's dedicated blacksmith, and Lady Ranni's war counsellor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224100050: I welcome one of your calibre. A fellow champion in service of Lady Ranni.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224101000: Thanks to you, Lady Ranni's fate once again stirs, and the path to Nokron has opened.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224101010: Descend underground where the fallen star struck Limgrave.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224101020: And make it yours. The precious treasure of Nokron.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224101030: So that Lady Ranni may tread the dark path of the Empyrean.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224102000: Oh, so you must be the one. Lady Ranni has explained everything.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224102010: You've defeated General Radahn, unlocking the stars.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224102020: A grand reward, justly procured by any measure.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224102030: The pleasure is mine. I am Iji.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224102040: The Carian royal family's dedicated blacksmith, and Lady Ranni's war counsellor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224102050: I welcome one of your calibre. A fellow champion in service of Lady Ranni.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224150000: Oh, there you are. Good of you to drop by.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224150010: Have you heard? Lady Ranni has departed on her journey.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224150020: Along the dark path of the Empyrean, from Renna's Rise, as she calls it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224150030: It would not have been possible without you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224150040: As Lady Ranni's war counsellor, and moreover, her childhood warden, I express my deepest gratitude.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224150050: You, and only you, were Lady Ranni's true champion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224151000: My purpose is nearing its end.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224151010: I've served Lady Ranni for as long as I can remember...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224151020: It has been a long and wondrous journey.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224151030: Now Lady Ranni is in your hands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224151040: I pray that you serve her well, unto the very end.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224152010: Are you certain? This is a fine reserve.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224152020: Perhaps you knew that Old Iji appreciates a good drink.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224152030: I'll save it for a quiet moment, that I might truly savour it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224153000: Lady Ranni has departed on her journey.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224153010: Along the dark path of the Empyrean, from Renna's Rise, as she calls it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224153020: Now Lady Ranni is in your hands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224153030: I pray that you serve her well, unto the very end.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224801010: There is no fight without a foe.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224802000: If that's the cloth you're cut from,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224802010: don't ever show your face again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224802020: Not to me. And not to my liege.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224803000: Not to me. And not to my liege.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224804000: How could I have missed this...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224812010: Don't ever show your face again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224812020: Not to me. And not to my liege.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.224814000: Go as you must, Lady Ranni...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226001000: Hallo coz, what are you doing here?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226001001: Hallo coz, what are you doing here?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226001010: I didn't think anyone knew about this place, 'cept us jars.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226001020: Oh! Are you going to be the new Potentate?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226002010: It's not easy being Potentate, though.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226002020: I know, show me your hands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226002030: It's just a little test, coz, to see if you've got the right stuff.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226002031: It's just a little test, coz, to see if you've got the right stuff.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226003010: Your skin isn't so smooth, is it...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226003020: You need slick, slidey hands to be Potentate, you know.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226003030: I'm sorry coz, but I don't think you've got what it takes...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226003031: I'm sorry coz, but I don't think you've got what it takes...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226004020: I have good tidings for you, coz.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226004021: I have good tidings for you, coz.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226004030: I have good tidings for you, coz.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226004040: Have you noticed the rare flowers growing in this village?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226004041: I asked the villagers if you could pick some of them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226004050: I asked the villagers if you could pick some of them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226004051: I asked the villagers if you could pick some of them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226004060: And they said you'd be very welcome!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226004070: The flowers we have now are nice, but it's a bit boring having the same ones all the time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226004080: I think everyone would be glad of a change, actually...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226005000: You know the huge vase, at the centre of our village?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226005010: If you plant lovely flower seeds inside the big vase, coz...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226005011: If you plant lovely flower seeds inside the big vase, coz...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226005020: Those flowers will bloom all through the whole village!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226007000: Coz. You'll be our Potentate after all, then?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226007001: Coz. You'll be our Potentate after all, then?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226007010: Coz. You'll be our Potentate after all, then?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226008020: We can still chat, Potentate or not.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226008030: Come back and visit me, when you can.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226009000: Go on, coz, you really should pick some of our flowers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226009001: Go on, coz, you really should pick some of our flowers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226009010: Go on, coz, you really should pick some of our flowers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226009020: Who knows, they might be of some use.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226010000: Oh, did you come to visit me again, coz?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226010001: Oh, did you come to visit me again, coz?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226010020: Can you tell me about the outside?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226010030: Oh first though, if you have some nice flower seeds,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226010040: can you put them in the big vase in the middle of the village?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226010050: I'm sure, when lots of them are in bloom,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226011020: Can you tell me about the outside?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226011030: Oh, and you put seeds in the big vase, didn't you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226011050: I'm so excited to see what kind of flowers will blossom...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226020010: You put seeds in the big vase, didn't you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226020020: Such pretty flowers are blooming! Everyone's so happy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226020030: I've never seen anything like it! I'd love to see more flowers from the outside, someday. Loads more!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226021010: You put seeds in the big vase, didn't you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226021020: But...I don't really like those flowers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226021030: I'm sorry coz, I know you brought the seeds from all that way away...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226021031: I'm sorry coz, I know you brought the seeds from all that way away...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226021040: But I'm a jar, and you're not. I s'pose we just see things differently.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226021041: But I'm a jar, and you're not. I s'pose we just see things differently.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226030010: Say, coz. Have you met Uncle Alexander?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226030011: Say, coz. Have you met Uncle Alexander?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226030020: He used to live here with us, but then he left, to be a champion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226030030: I asked to go with him, but he said "The path of champions must be trod alone".
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226030040: So heroic, right? I miss him though.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226030050: If you see him, you should ask him to teach you how to fight, coz.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226030051: If you see him, you should ask him to teach you how to fight, coz.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226030060: He's big and tough and strong!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226031000: Uncle Alexander said he won't be back again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226031010: "My home is of the past. And the past, as they say, is a different country."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226031020: I suppose that's part of being a warrior, isn't it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226031030: So...please don't tell anyone, coz, but...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226031031: So...please don't tell anyone, coz, but...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226031040: I'm actually a warrior jar as well! One day, I'll be just like Uncle Alexander.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226031050: And I'll have to leave the village to become a champion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226032000: Uncle Alexander won't come back here again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226032010: "My home is of the past. And the past, as they say, is a different country."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226032020: I suppose that's part of being a warrior, isn't it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226040010: Do you know what a poacher is, coz?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226040011: Do you know what a poacher is, coz?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226040020: They hunt us, smash us, and then take us away.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226040030: This village is kept secret, so I think we're safe here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226040040: But you should be careful if you ever meet one of them, coz.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226040041: But you should be careful if you ever meet one of them, coz.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226040050: I hope uncle Alexander beats them all up, first...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226041000: Those awful poachers. I hope uncle Alexander beats them all up.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226050010: Have you heard? A new Potentate's come to the village!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226050020: I think he said his name was Diallos.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226050030: He seems a little down in the dumps, but his hands! As smooth as silk!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226051000: I don't know, I'm a little disappointed actually.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226051010: Even though good sir Diallos has a wonderful suit of armour...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226051020: He says he isn't a warrior.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226051030: And since he's a coward, he won't be fighting anymore.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226051040: His smooth and silky hands feel nice when he pats us.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226051050: But I wish we had a potentate big and strong like you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226051051: But I wish we had a potentate big and strong like you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226052000: Diallos' smooth and silky hands feel nice when he pats us...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226052010: But I wish we had a potentate big and strong like you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226052011: But I wish we had a potentate big and strong like you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226052020: But I wish we had a potentate big and strong like you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226060020: But we're fine now. Diallos fought the poacher.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226060030: Though quite a lot of us got broken...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226060050: I won't cry though... I'm a warrior jar. A warrior.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226061000: "The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226061010: That's the kind of warrior I want to be one day, coz.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226061011: That's the kind of warrior I want to be one day, coz.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226061020: Even if I'm scared, I'll still fight to protect everyone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226062000: "The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226062010: That's the kind of warrior I'm going to be.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226070010: I've been thinking. It's time for me to set out on a journey.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226070020: As a warrior jar, upon the path of champions.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226071050: I'm a warrior jar, so I need to be strong.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226071060: I can really have them, right?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226071080: Strong enough I deserve to have Uncle's insides.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226072000: I'm about to go on a journey.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226072010: As a warrior jar, in search of glory.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226073020: No, I haven't changed my mind.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226073030: I'll begin my journey once I'm ready to go.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226073040: As a warrior jar, in search of glory.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226074000: I'll begin my journey once I'm ready to go.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226074010: As a warrior jar, in search of glory.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226080000: I don't think I'll see you again, when I set out.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226080010: Warriors are supposed to work alone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226083020: Tell me a story... About the big, wide world...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226084010: It's me! I'm a warrior jar too!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226801020: Don't be such a nasty brute.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226802000: Is this who you are, coz?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226802001: Is this who you are, coz?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226802010: Is this who you are, coz?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226803000: You were a poacher, all along.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226803001: You were a poacher, all along.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226803010: You were a poacher, all along.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226804000: So, you were a poacher, too.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226804001: So, you were a poacher, too.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226804010: So, you were a poacher, too.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226804020: But the tale of house Hoslow is told in blood.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226804030: I'll find you, one day, coz...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226804031: I'll find you, one day, coz...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.226804040: I'll find you, one day, coz...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.227001010: You promised me. When we turned 14, we'd go to see the stars...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.227001020: I've been waiting ever so long. Forever and ever, it seems.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.227002000: Ahh, dear sister, you're finally here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.227002010: No time to waste. Let's see the stars.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228001000: Foul Tarnished, what do you want?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228001020: That I possess no such medallion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228001030: Or have you come to take more from me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228001040: Was my other half not enough?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228001050: I told the bastard in the bone armour.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228002000: I told the all-hearing brute already.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228002010: That I possess no such medallion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228002020: Or have you come to take more from me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228002030: Was my other half not enough?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228002040: I told the bastard in bone armour already.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228010010: So old Albus entrusted his medallion to you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228010030: Then I've no choice. But to trust that this was his dying will.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228010040: Let's try again. I'm Latenna. An Albinauric, the same as Old Albus.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228010050: My apologies for my coarse words earlier.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228010060: I presumed the worst, seeing that you were another Tarnished, like that all-hearing brute.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228010070: I hope that you will forgive me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228010080: I presumed the worst, seeing that you were another Tarnished, like the bastard before.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228011000: Mm, the medallion is better off in your hands, anyway.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228011010: Would you consider doing me a great service?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228011030: There is something that I must do, even if I must say farewell to my wolf, Lobo.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228011040: Will you show me the way? To the land of Miquella's Haligtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228011050: If you accept, I would gladly apprise you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228011060: Of the whereabouts of the medallion's other half.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228012010: They say the other half of the medallion is beyond the forbidden lands north of the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228012020: In Castle Sol, on the Mountaintops of the Giants, accessible by the Grand Lift of Rold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228013010: Farewell, Lobo. My faithful wolf, my better half.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228013020: I will go with the Tarnished. So that our journey will not have been in vain.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228014010: And I will fight at your side.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228015010: I understand. You must have your own duty to fulfil.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228015020: But please, allow me to say my piece.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228015030: Even if you cannot take me, old Albus wished I relay to you the following:
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228015040: The other half of the medallion can be found beyond the forbidden lands north of the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228015050: In Castle Sol, on the Mountaintops of the Giants, accessible by the Grand Lift of Rold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228016000: If you seek the other half of the medallion, they say it's beyond the forbidden lands north of the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228016010: In Castle Sol, on the Mountaintops of the Giants, accessible by the Grand Lift of Rold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228017010: You'll lead me then, to the land of Miquella's Haligtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228017020: Farewell, Lobo. My faithful wolf, my better half.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228017030: I will go with the Tarnished. So that our journey will not have been in vain.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228018000: Do you hear me? It is I, Latenna.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228018010: We're almost there. Castle Sol lies just off to the north,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228018020: where the other medallion is housed. It will grant passage to the land of the Haligtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228019000: Castle Sol lies just off to the north,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228019010: where the other medallion is housed. It will grant passage to the land of the Haligtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228020000: Oh young yet towering sister of ours.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228020020: And create life. For us. For all the Albinaurics.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228021020: Our young yet towering sister will give us hope.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228021030: Now that nothing is left unfinished,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228021040: I will join you in battle to the bitter end.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228021050: And when the fighting is done,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228021060: then you may lay me to rest. Beside Lobo, my dear wolf.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228030000: Do you hear me? It is I, Latenna.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228030010: We have reached the land of Miquella's Haligtree, where Lobo and I began our travels.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228030020: It's entirely thanks to you that I'm so close to home.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228030030: These great snow-laden lands stretch far to the north.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228030040: And beyond the ancient bowers, and the liturgical town of Ordina,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228030050: lies the place to which I must return.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228031000: We have reached the land of Miquella's Haligtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228031010: These great snow-laden lands stretch far to the north.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228031020: And beyond the ancient bowers, and the liturgical town of Ordina,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228031030: lies the place to which I must return.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228801010: And I'll consider that a simple mishap.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228802000: Are all you Tarnished the same?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228802010: Was taking my other half not enough for you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.228803000: There is no meaning in a fight, lest it serve a greater duty.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300001000: Brave Tarnished, welcome to the Volcano Manor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300001010: I am Tanith, the proprietress of this house.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300001030: "A warrior of promise," I believe she said.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300001040: Perhaps you are prepared to make a commitment.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300001050: Will you join us here at the Volcano Manor, and resist the tide?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300001060: Why accept the burden of their grace, or be fooled by the dogmatic ramblings of the Fingers?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300001070: Rise with us, against the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300002000: Interesting. Your decision is most welcome.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300002010: Now you belong to the Volcano Manor family.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300002020: The drawing room lies down the hall. Make yourself comfortable.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300002030: But be sure to earn your keep.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300003010: Rya will be disappointed, but I won't twist your arm.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300003020: Now, time for you to leave, I should think.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300003030: Let this intersection of our paths be the last.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300004010: We rarely receive visitors to the Volcano Manor without invitation.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300004020: Fascinating. And not unlike another guest we had long agoâ€¦
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300004030: So, Tarnished, have you ever harboured doubts?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300004040: About the burden of grace, and the dogmatic ramblings of the Fingers?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300004050: If you have, why not join the Volcano Manor, and fight with us?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300004060: Rise with us, against the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300005010: Now you belong to the Volcano Manor family.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300005020: The drawing room lies down the hall. Make yourself comfortable.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300005030: I am Tanith, the proprietress of this house. An honour to have you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300006010: Now, time for you to leave, I should think.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300006020: Let this intersection of our paths be the last.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300007000: Did you read the letter left for you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300007010: That is the task the Volcano Manor desires you enact.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300007020: You will be compensated once the deed is done. Good luck.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300007030: If you are loath to hunt your own kin, so be it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300007040: But you must leave this house at once.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300007050: This is a war against the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300007060: We have no place for the meek, nor the luxury of keeping clean hands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300008020: Of rising with us, against the Erdtree?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300009020: Now you belong to the Volcano Manor family.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300009030: The drawing room lies down the hall. Make yourself comfortable.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300010010: I am pleased. Now you are a recusant true, and a full-fledged member of the Volcano Manor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300010020: This is your reward, as promised.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300010030: Never forget. That the recusant fights to tread the path of the champion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300010040: The way is tainted, but for this very reason,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300010050: it is the true path to valour.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300012000: I see you've performed another task for us.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300012010: Here is your usual reward. Please, take it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300012020: Now, perhaps the time has come to tell you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300012030: Of the true ruler of this manor, Lord Rykard.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300012040: The Erdtree blessed the Tarnished with grace.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300012050: But it was all too meagre, in the face of the enormity of their task.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300012060: The Tarnished were forced to scavenge, squabbling for crumbs.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300012070: Like the shardbearers, vying for power in the wake of the Shattering.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300012080: Our Lord, indignant, has refused. To scurry about, fighting over what miserly scraps they allow us.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300012090: If the Erdtree, and indeed the very gods, would debase us so,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300012100: then we are willing to raise the banner of resistance, even if it means heresy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300012110: We at the Volcano Manor, under Lord Rykard, have sworn no rest until it is done.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300012120: If you follow this heroic path, one day the Lord will see you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300012130: The Lord's visits with our champions are always a spectacle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300012140: It cannot come a day too soon!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300013000: The letter describes the task the Volcano Manor desires you enact.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300013010: You will be compensated once the deed is done. Good luck.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300014000: If you follow this heroic path, one day the Lord will see you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300014010: It cannot come a day too soon!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300021010: I should have known something was wrong. The signs were clear enough.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300021020: Well. Zorayas has placed her trust in you. All the more reason I must tell you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300021030: That some things are better left unknown. Besides, no-one should be blamed for their heritage.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300021040: Think about it. We are resisting the ways of the Erdtree itself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300021050: What matters one's lineage in such a crisis?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300022000: No, I haven't seen Zorayas anywhere.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300022010: And she has no scouting duties now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300022020: Has she gone off in search of answers?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300023010: Not as the Manor's proprietress, but as Zorayas' mother.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300023020: If she discovers the answer to her question, and it causes distress,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300023040: To purge that which would cause her pain.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300024010: My wish is a grave disrespect to her.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300024020: No different than the Erdtree's imposition.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300024030: But I've no choice... It must be done.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300025000: Thank you, for allowing me this.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300025010: I will never be a good mother. My heart is too frail.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300025020: Our Lord must have known this all along.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300025030: My meekness is all too clear...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300026020: If you would...allow me some time alone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300029000: Please, allow me some time alone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300030000: I see that you've stayed the path of champions.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300030010: This is your usual reward. Please, take it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300030020: Perhaps you are ready. Might you see our Lord?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300030030: Our Lord will no doubt welcome you. Another kindred spirit, treading the path of champions.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300031010: Now, close your eyes for a moment.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300031020: I will transport you to the Lord's chamber.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300032000: I see... Well, I cannot make you take the leap.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300032020: To follow the path of valour, an audience with our Lord is essential.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300032030: In order to defy this debasement, and rise up against the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300032040: Like a true recusant of the Volcano Manor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300033000: Won't you consider having an audience with our Lord?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300033010: Our Lord will no doubt welcome you. Another kindred spirit, treading the path of champions.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300040010: It's true then. You've defeated our Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300040020: No, I must thank you. Our Lord was yet weak. You have taught us that.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300040030: Defeat is not the end. Our Lord is immortal, and will one day rise again, stronger.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300040040: Until then, I must stay the path, and do my part.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300041000: I will leave the Volcano Manor before long.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300041010: I suggest you do the same.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300041020: Here is my thanks. For allowing our Lord to be revived, even stronger than before.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300041040: The champion who walks the tainted path shines all the more.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300050020: Our Lord's carcass is vast, and not easily consumed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300050030: Dear Rykard, please find purchase within me,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300050040: I wish to be your serpent; your family.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300050050: One day, let us devour the gods together.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300051000: Dear Rykard, please find purchase within me,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300051010: I wish to be your serpent; your family.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300051020: One day, let us devour the gods together.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300076000: Now, time for you to leave, I should think.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300076010: Let this intersection of our paths be the last.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300077000: The drawing room is through the hall.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300077010: Use the key I handed you, and make yourself comfortable.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300078020: Of rising with us, against the Erdtree?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300079020: Now you belong to the Volcano Manor family.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300079030: The drawing room lies down the hall. Make yourself comfortable.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300080000: Now, time for you to leave, I should think.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300080010: Let this intersection of our paths be the last.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300081000: The drawing room is through the hall.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300081010: Use the key I handed you, and make yourself comfortable.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300082000: Now you are a recusant true, and a full-fledged member of the Volcano Manor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300082010: I am pleased to have you on our side.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300110010: The girl, Ryaâ€¦with her true face.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300110030: Well, if she confided in you the name Zorayas,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300110040: then perhaps it is not my place to speak.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300110050: But as her adoptive mother, I ask of you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300110060: Please, be kind to her. Look after young Zorayas.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300110070: Her true visage belies the purity of her heart.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300110080: â€¦Honestly, I hardly deserve the sweet child.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300111000: Please, be kind to her. Look after young Zorayas.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300111010: Her true visage belies the purity of her heart.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300112000: Zorayas has placed her trust in you. All the more reason I must tell you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300112010: That some things are better left unknown. Besides, no-one should be blamed for their heritage.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300113000: My wish is a grave disrespect to her.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300113010: But I've no choice... It must be done.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300114000: Sweet Zorayas, have I earned your scorn?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300200010: Perhaps we will meet again, along the path.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300201010: I have no need of that.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300201020: I must continue devouring my beloved lord...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.300202020: Our lord's carcass is not easily consumed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301001010: Come to the Lands Between for the Elden Ring, hmm?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301001020: Of course you have. No shame in it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301001030: But I'm afraid you're plumb out of luck.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301001040: You are maidenless. A bit player, fully divorced from the strength of runes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301001050: Feel free to go off and die in a ditch somewhere.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301002000: Oh, can't seem to wrap your head around your predicament?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301002010: It's no surprise. You poor have-nots are a stubborn lot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301002030: If you must have a go at it, maidenless as you are, you'll require an education.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301002040: On the ways of the learned Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301002050: Are you familiar with grace? The golden light that gives life to you Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301002060: You may also behold its golden rays pointing in a particular direction at times.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301002070: That is the guidance of grace. The path that a Tarnished must travel.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301002080: It's nothing short of a miracle. That the guidance of grace can lead you,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301002090: maidenless as you are, to the perfect place to die in obscurity.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301003010: Shouldn't you be off proving yourself, or some such?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301003020: Then go on, take the hint and follow the guidance of grace.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301003030: To Castle Stormveil, on the cliff.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301003040: And if, by chance, you do find your way to the castle,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301003050: you may receive a summons. To the famed Roundtable Holdâ€¦
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301004000: Guidance will show the way, most certainly.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301004010: To Castle Stormveil, over on the cliff.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301004020: The home of the decrepit demigod, Godrick the Grafted.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301004030: Although I'm afraid you'll never make it that far, hmm.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301004040: Rest assured, I sympathise, deeply. There's no worse fate than to be maidenless.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301004050: Oh, but if, by chance, you do find your way to the castle,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301004060: you may receive a summons. To the famed Roundtable Holdâ€¦
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301011010: Come to the Lands Between for the Elden Ring, hmm?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301011020: Of course you have. No shame in it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301011030: Unfortunately for you, however, you are maidenless.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301011040: Without guidance, without the strength of runes, and without an invitation to the Roundtable Hold...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301011050: You are fated, it seems, to die in obscurity.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301012000: Luckily for you, however, there is one shining ray of hope for even the maidenless.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301012010: Me. VarrÃ©. Take care to listen.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301012020: Are you familiar with grace? The golden light that gives life to you Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301012030: You may also behold its golden rays pointing in a particular direction at times.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301012040: That is the guidance of grace. The path that a Tarnished must travel.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301012050: Mm, indeed. Grace's guidance holds the answers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301012060: It will lead you Tarnished to the path you are meant to follow.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301012070: Even if it leads you to your grave.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301013000: Grace's guidance will reveal the path forward, most certainly.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301013010: To Castle Stormveil, over on the cliff.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301013020: The home of the decrepit demigod, Godrick the Grafted.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301014000: It's time you set off, I should think.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301014010: To Castle Stormveil, on the cliff, where grace would guide you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301014020: If you seek the Elden Ring, maidenless as you are.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301020000: Ohh, well done, well done indeed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301020010: You made it through that entire mess, all the way to Stormveil.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301020020: And off you trotted to the Roundtable Holdâ€¦ My sincerest congratulations.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301020030: But, how did you find the Roundtable?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301020040: Oh, you don't have to say it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301020050: Before, the Roundtable was chock full of venerated warriors, but now, it's home to puff-chests and has-beens.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301020060: I fear you've been terribly disappointed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301020070: I don't blame you. But still, the Roundtable has its perks.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301020080: Why not earn a seat? Fly straight and true, so to speak.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301021000: Ahh, then you're interested? A wise choice indeed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301021010: To join the Roundtable proper, you must acquire a Great Rune, and request audience...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301021020: ...with the Two Fingers, in the inner chamber.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301021030: They are the purported masters of the grace that guides your kind, the Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301021040: Mm, yes, pay them a visit, so that you may see for yourself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301022000: Challenge Godrick the Grafted, lord of Stormveil, to acquire a Great Rune.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301022010: Decrepit, he may be, but a demigod he remains. And of course, an inheritor of a Great Rune.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301022020: Worse yet, I hear old Godrick's acquired a ferocious new toy to graft...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301023010: Yes, I see. Perhaps it's just as well.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301023020: Besides, you are maidenless. One can only do so much with the materials provided.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301023030: But then again, if you should realise the error of your ways,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301023040: I'm always willing to hear you out.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301024000: Oh, have you decided to have a go after all? At joining the Roundtable proper?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301025010: Aren't you supposed to be earning your place at the Roundtable Hold?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301025020: Then you must face Godrick the Grafted, lord of Stormveil,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301025030: for without a Great Rune, you will not be granted audience.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301025040: With the Two Fingers, in the inner chamber.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301026000: Ohh, well done, well done indeed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301026010: You bested Godrick the Grafted, and claimed a Great Rune.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301026020: You felled a demigod, and claimed a Great Rune.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301026050: For an audience with the Two Fingers, in the inner chamber.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301027010: For an audience with the Two Fingers, in the inner chamber.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301030010: You claimed a Great Rune, and had your audience. With the Two Fingers, at the Roundtable Hold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301030020: You've had your audience. With the Two Fingers, at the Roundtable Hold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301031000: Ah-ha, your intuition serves you well.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301031010: My doubts had been piling up, you see.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301031020: ...The words of the Two Fingers cannot be trusted.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301031030: Truly, naught but rambling, senile delusions.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301031040: I believe, that when the Elden Ring was shattered, the Two Fingers were corrupted, their guidance; skewed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301031050: Even worse, the Fingers harbor no love for our kind.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301031060: That's the part that irks the most.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301032000: Oh, I have a gift for you, something fit only for the wise.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301033000: A means for circumventing the draw of the Two Fingers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301033010: Give it a try, won't you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301033020: And if it please you, may we meet again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301033030: I've high hopes for you. My lambkin.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301034000: You don't say. Well, what a relief that must be.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301034010: You may go, then. My work here is done.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301034020: May the wisdom of the Two Fingers guide you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301036000: Be sure to try that finger I gave you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301036020: The Tarnished were spurned by grace, forsaken by the Two Fingers. And now they ask you to mend their crumbling world?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301036030: Hah, your loyalties are misplaced with them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301037000: Be sure to try that finger I gave you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301037010: I'm quite certain that you'll take to it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301050000: Oh, lambkin, so pleased you're here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301050010: I'm glad that you're enjoying my gift.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301050020: Mmm, I knew it from the very start.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301050030: You have a taste for noble blood.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301050050: I wish to anoint you a proper inductee.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301050060: A knight to serve Luminary Mohg, the Lord of Blood, and establish a new dynasty.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301050070: Luminary Mohg has strength, vision, and of course, love.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301050080: So, what do you say, my lambkin?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301051000: Mm, yes, who would have it any other way?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301051020: For your final trial. Soak the cloth with a maiden's blood.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301051030: Normally, this ritual would involve killing one's own maiden, and recanting the wisdom of the Two Fingers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301051040: But since you are maidenless, the blood of anyone's maiden will do.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301052000: Oh my, perhaps you misheard me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301052010: Nothing wrong with giving you a day or two.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301052020: For your ears to clear out.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301053010: Could you tell me once more? Your honest reply.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301054020: And with this, you are a formal inductee.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301054030: A knight who will assist Luminary Mohg, the Lord of Blood, in the establishment of a new dynasty.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301054050: This noble blood will be an immutable badge of honor, once it settles. Inside of you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301054060: Oh, good heavens. Clench your teeth, or something.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301054070: Never forget that feeling of agony.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301054080: For it is what binds you, to Luminary Mohg. To all of us.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301054100: You have the sweetest scream. My lambkin.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301055000: Oh, another thing. You should have this.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301056000: A medal granted by the new Mohgwyn dynasty.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301056010: With the power to grant audience with Luminary Mohg.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301056020: I've gone out of my way to provide one to you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301056030: But you mustn't use it just yet.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301056040: The meeting must wait until the Mohgwyn dynasty commences.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301056050: Luminary Mohg yet slumbers beside the Divinity.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301056060: We must endure a little longer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301057000: Ahh, it is trying, but we must be patient.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301057010: One day, you will be elevated, deservedly, basking in love.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301058000: The cloth is your final trial. Soak it with the blood of a maiden.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301058010: The blood of anyone's maiden will do. You are maidenless, after all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301080000: What business does a maidenless wretch like you have here?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301080010: Did you come seeking violence, upon learning my esteemed position under Luminary Mohg?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301080020: I'll take pleasure in ensuring you regret this.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301081000: You seek violence, heedless of my warning, though you have been raised to a knight of the dynasty?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301081010: I am pained, to the very depths of my being.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301081020: I'll ensure you regret this, my lambkin.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301082000: How dare you trouble Luminary Mohg's passions.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301086030: Bless the Mohgwyn Dynasty, with love!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301802010: If you mistake kindness for frailty of heart,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301802020: then perhaps a more physical lesson is in order!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301803010: Perhaps noble blood is too rich for the maidenless.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301803020: Well, no sense in sparing your life now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301804000: You were a maidenless upstart to begin with.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301804010: You will die nameless, without ceremony.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301805000: Oh dear, a pity it's come to this, my lambkin.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301805010: How does it feel to die a failure?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301805020: Materials of quality are so hard to find, these days...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301806010: Who do you think I am?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.301807010: Bless the Mohgwyn Dynasty, with love!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302002010: I would advise against taking the main gate into the castle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302002020: It's tightly guarded by hardened old hands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302002040: The guards don't know about it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302003010: ...You're just the kind of Tarnished that I like.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302004000: Fair enough, you certainly don't have to trust me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302004010: Well, If you must go through the gates, I'll signal them to open.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302004020: But of course, I'd advise against it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302005000: Use that opening to breach the castle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302005010: The guards haven't a clue about it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302006010: When you approach the gates, I'll signal them to open.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302006020: It's only your neck on the line, after all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302008000: ...You're just the kind of Tarnished that I like.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302009000: The gates are open. Do as you like.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302009010: It's only your neck on the line, after all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302020010: Oh, great, I'm glad you're here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302020020: Just a small reward, I was saving it for you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302021000: Good, now let's be on our way, shall we?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302021010: Wouldn't want the guards to spot you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302022010: What'll happen if the guards catch you strutting about?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302025010: Another one...another one all skin and bones.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302025030: ...Ahh, not a muscle on this one either...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302026010: For god's sake, don't scare me like that!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302026030: What, oh, just clearing out some corpses.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302026040: Can't just leave them about, you know, they'll start to pong, eh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302027000: Oh, hello. No, don't you mind me for a minute.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302027010: It's my job to keep the grounds clean.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302040000: Oh, hello... Glad to see you safe.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302040010: I've come into some fine goods.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302040020: Only, it turns out I can't use a one of them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302040030: Perhaps you'd like to take them off my hands?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302041000: Oh, hello, anything you'd care to purchase?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302050000: What a pathetic excuse for a Lord you were. Craven to the bone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302050010: Pushing me about like that. And after all that grafting? Where did that get you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302050020: Look down, on me, would you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302050040: Feel it! Feel it! Feel my bloody wrath!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302051010: This weasel was... Godrick was always looking down on me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302051020: He got what he bloody deserved, thanks to you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302051030: I tell you though, what goes around comes around.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302051040: He had an ugly heart, an uglier countenance, and met the ugliest of ends, eh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302052010: I can do whatever takes my fancy...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302060020: Well, I suppose I did save your life, in a way.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302060030: I'll gladly take it off your hands. Be rude not to, eh!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302060040: Mmm, you Tarnished are alright by me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302060050: The sweet ones like you, anyway.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302070010: Haven't seen your mug in quite some time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302070020: As you can see, I'm the new Lady's attendant.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302070050: Lady Nepheli's still fair of heart and countenance...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302071000: Still, I have the Lady's trust.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302071010: ...So I can loot all the corpses I like.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302071020: I'll let you take a look at the goods, if you fancy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302072000: Ah, back again, are we? Curious one, you are.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302072010: Well then, what are you after?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302803000: Finally given up the ghost, eh...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302803010: Oh, don't worry, I've got big plans for what's left of you...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302804010: Do you feel my bloody wrath?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302805000: Damn it all. Why is it always me...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.302805010: What did I do to deserve...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303001000: Good Lord! Good God of Vengeance!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303002020: I am Guilbert. A Redeemer of vengeance. In all its forms.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303003010: Have you heard of the crucible knights?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303003020: There's one by the name of Ordovis, and I must find him.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303003030: He's an old hero of the Shattering, but there's a grudge out against him.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303003040: The Lands Between are brimming with those who cannot die. It makes for a cesspool of vengeance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303003050: ...Gives me a shiver just thinking about it...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303004010: Who knows, just some lads who did someone wrong.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303004020: They got what was coming, nothing more.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303004030: If you're intent on revenge, pray to the God of Vengeance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303004040: You'll have yourself a corpse in no time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303005000: You're Tarnished. Then you're here to fight, aren't you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303005020: Well, there's something you ought to know.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303005030: There's an aberration of a blacksmith past the checkpoint that leads to Stormveil.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303005040: He doesn't seem to think much of anyone or anything, but oddly, he's willing to smith weapons for Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303005050: He has a fine arm. Have him take a crack at your goods.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303005060: ...The question for me, of course, is whether he's in need of any vengeance...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303006000: In the Lands Between, everyone lives longer than they should.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303006010: They may go mad, but even so, they plead to the God of Vengeance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303006020: That's why I'm here. To exact revenge for those who can't do it themselves.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303006030: Like someone did for me, when I...when I was but a tyke.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303010010: It must have been a dream. Strange.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303010020: I was fighting at your side. Against Ordovis of the Crucible.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303010030: It was a revenge so sweet, fit to serve the very God of Vengeance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303010050: Maybe you're meant to be a Redeemer, as well...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303010520: I was fighting at your side. Against Ordovis, the Crucible Knight.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303011010: Did you defeat Ordovis of the Crucible?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303011020: I could sense it. The God of Vengeance surely smiled upon that battle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303011040: Maybe you're meant to be a Redeemer too...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303011510: Did you defeat Ordovis, the Crucible Knight.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303013020: Lord Godrick has kept busy with his grafting...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303013030: Slicing off arms like harvesting ears of wheat. He's run up a mighty debt in blood.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303013040: A demigod, yes, he may be...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303013050: But no one escapes a Redeemer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303014020: About the vengeance sought by General Radahn, to whom I swore my oath.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303014030: ...Yes, Godrick's corpse will know what to do...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303014920: That of all the grudges born of the Shattering, Malenia the Rotted is the object of the most profound.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303015000: Ahh, my head is throbbing, everything is bright red...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303015010: Master Radahn, is this how it feels to ferment with vengeance?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303015020: I can hardly keep from trembling...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303900000: Well, well, you've made yourself a target of vengeance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303900010: Perhaps this, too, was meant to be.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303900030: Trust me, you'll rest easier as a corpse.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303901000: Hello there, I don't believe we've met.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303901010: I'm afraid you've made yourself the object of somebody's ire.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303901020: As a Redeemer, I'm bound to exact revenge.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303901040: Trust me, you'll rest easier as a corpse.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303902000:
Whoah, what're you playing at? (OKãƒ†ã‚¤ã‚¯, v303902000_ALT_3)
What're you playing at?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303903020: There's no revenge to be had in this killing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303904010: If you want to die, ask someone else.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303906010: Wherever vengeance must be had, a Redeemer there will be...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303907000: Oh, my Lord. Good God of Vengeance!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303908010: There is no escape from a Redeemer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303909010: What am I to make of this?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303910020: Prepare to become an offering, once and for all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.303910030: Trust me, you'll rest easier as a corpse.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307001000: I see... You must be Ranni's new hireling.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307001001: I see... You must be Ranni's new girl.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307001010: Yes, yes, I've heard all about you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307001020: I am Seluvis, preceptor in the sorcerous arts.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307001030: I don't know what it is the mistress sees in a provincial Tarnished like you,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307001040: but since we have the misfortune of serving the same Lady,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307001050: I ask that you kindly try not to drag us all down with you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307002000: I reside...in another tower, close by.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307002010: Come and pay me a visit...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307002020: Should you wish to be of actual service to Mistress Ranni.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307002030: If it were up to me, I wouldn't waste my time on the likes of you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307002040: But who am I to stand against the wishes of my Lady?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307010000: Well, well. You took me at my word.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307010010: Did you not realise I was merely being polite? You provincials never cease to amaze...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307010020: Hmm, I suppose you're here now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307010030: Perhaps I'll give you something to do.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307010040: I'd like you to find a woman called Nepheli, to administer a potion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307010050: Even you can do that much, can't you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307011010: Now I shall hand over the potion in question.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307011020: Find Nepheli, and ensure she drinks it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307011030: I expect glad tidings. And soon.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307012010: What a wretched bunch you Tarnished are.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307012020: Do you understand? I've given you a very fine chance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307012030: If you complete this simple task, I will graciously permit you to learn from me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307012040: Even you wish to serve our Lady well, do you not?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307012050: Turn those little cogs upstairs, and return with the correct answer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307013000: Have you fumbled out the correct answer now?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307013010: Then you will undertake my task?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307014010: You are peerless in your dullardry.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307014020: Fine. I can feel my wits evaporating in your mere presence.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307014030: Don't bother wasting your breath on me again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307015000: I could have sworn I told you to trouble me no more...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307015010: Are you here to tender your sincere apology, and undertake my task?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307016010: As a man of abundant charity, I accept your apology.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307016020: Now I shall hand over the potion in question.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307016030: Find Nepheli, and ensure she drinks it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307016040: I expect glad tidings. And soon.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307017000: I've no time for idle chit chat.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307017010: The only thing I will hear from you is a report of your task's completion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307017020: Are we understood? Then off you trot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307017030: I have enough on my plate.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307030000: Ahh, so you made Nepheli drink the potion?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307030010: Well done. You are a touch more useful than I had thought.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307030011: Well done. You are a slight more useful than I had thought.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307030020: Very well. Then you shall have your gift.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307030030: Knowledge of the sorcerous arts, under the tutelage of the great Preceptor Seluvis.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307030040: I doubt much of it will lay within the grasp of a mere Tarnished, but...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307030050: If you put your mind to it, perhaps you won't embarrass our Lady.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307031000: You wish to begin right this moment?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307031010: Well, your impatience, though boorish, is understandable. Let's have at it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307032000: Begging for another lesson so soon?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307032010: There remains much to be done. Make it quick.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307033000: Come now, the pretence of comprehension becomes you not.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307033010: Bend over backwards any further and you're apt to break.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307040000: Well, well. You're asking me about that, are you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307040010: The task was left to you and the mongrel, was it not?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307040020: Not only are you incompetent, but shameless to boot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307040040: Now's as good a time as any. I'll let you in on it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307040050: There's a glintstone sorcerer by the name of Sellen in Limgrave.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307040060: She owes me for the help I gave her when she was expelled from the academy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307040070: I asked her to look into the matter some time ago.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307040080: I'll write you a letter of introduction. Go ask her.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307041000: So, you had Nepheli drink the potion? Truly?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307041010: Hmm. Then perhaps something was amiss with it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307041020: It's concocted from the finest ingredients. But perhaps I should review the recipe.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307041030: I may have expected too much of her, to begin with.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307050000: You break into a man's private chambers, rooting about as you please?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307050030: You tricked Nepheli, and had her drink the potion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307050040: I believe that makes you my accomplice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307050050: You yearn for a puppet of your own, hmm?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307050060: Well, normally one of your stature would never be allowed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307050070: But perhaps I can make a very special exception.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307051000: Ah, I knew you'd see things my way.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307051010: You knew you were already my accomplice, and as such...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307051020: You wanted one for yourself, hmm? A puppet, to cherish.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307051030: Oh I can see right through you. That's just the kind of man you are.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307051031: Oh I can see right through you. That's just the kind of woman you are.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307051040: Well, it's been some time since a pupil of mine last walked this road.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307051050: To mark the occasion, I shall grant you the puppet you so desire.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307052020: The tipple you fooled Nepheli into drinking, yes, my little draught.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307052040: Are you ready to change your mind, now?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307052050: It's no sin, pining for a puppet to cherish.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307053000: Now, hand it over, and don't make a fuss.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307053010: Nothing bad will happen. I'll even consider giving you a puppet of your own.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307054020: Fine. Leave this place, and never darken my doorstep again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307054040: This is the last time I'll see you, in your present state.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307055000: I thought I told you never to show your face again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307055010: Have you decided to return what's mine, and proffer a sincere apology?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307056010: As a man of abundant charity, I accept your apology.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307056020: And well, you finally realised, did you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307056030: All you really wanted was a puppet to cherish. To fill that hole deep in your heart.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307056040: Oh I can see right through you. That's just the kind of man you are.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307056041: Oh I can see right through you. That's just the kind of woman you are.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307056050: Well, it's been some time since a pupil of mine last walked this road.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307056060: To mark the occasion, I shall grant you the puppet you so desire.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307060000: How's the puppet I gave you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307060010: A thing of exquisite craft, is it not?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307070000: What's that? You want another puppet?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307070010: Quite the keen paramour, aren't we.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307070011: Well, aren't you a woman of many passions.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307070020: But, I'm afraid each and every one is like a child to me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307070030: I can hardly just give them away.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307070040: Oh dear, what's to be done?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307070050: Why don't you...fetch me some starlight shards?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307070060: It's no mere booze, but a refined old drink of amber hue.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307070070: If you can manage it, I'll gladly prepare a new puppet for you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307070080: The soul of every puppet has its own ambience. You'll soon come to know, once you possess a few.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307070090: And once each's predilections are known to you, the better you'll be able to love them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307070100: Oh yes, you have much to look forward to, further down this road.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307080000: You're proving to be quite the puppeteer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307080010: I've not had an apprentice forâ€¦a very long time indeed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307081000: Perhaps, you'd be interested in a little scheme of mine?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307081010: It will produce the finest of puppets.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307081020: Which I aspire to cherish with these very hands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307081030: A ploy to fool even Lady Ranni... How does that sound?
