N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307082000: Ahh, I knew I had you pegged.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307082001: Heh. I knew I had you pegged.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307082020: Then I'd like you to procure something.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307082030: A rather unique starlight shard that glistens with amber.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307082040: With that, my special draught will gleam with nectar-sweetness.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307082050: And even a demigod would be slave to its charms...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307082070: The rather unique starlight shard that glistens with amber.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307082080: With that, my special draught will gleam with nectar-sweetness.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307082090: And even a demigod would be slave to its charms...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307083020: You passed my little test with flying colours.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307083030: I was merely gauging your loyalty to Lady Ranni.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307083040: Well done, I'm very proud of you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307083050: Let's both do our utmost in service of our Lady.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307084000: Ah ha. Might you be interested after all?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307084010: In a fine scheme to sport with Lady Ranni?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307085010: Your test is well and truly over.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307085020: Wag your tail for master all you like, but your loyalty is merely blind.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307085030: I fear your wretched provinciality is apt to burst. You're oozing at the seams.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307090000: Well, well, you managed to lay your hands on it!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307090010: The blessed day is finally upon us...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307090020: Goodness gracious, the way it glistens...utterly enchanting.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307090030: To think, this was once a demigod's very fate...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307091010: Oh yes, I should give you your reward.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307091020: Please, it's all yours. Splendid work. Just marvellous.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307091030: Now, just you wait. The merriment is soon to begin.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307091040: The scheme I promised is to be revealed very shortly...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307092000: Good, I've been waiting for you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307092010: It's finally complete. The perfection of my draught, gleaming nectar-sweet.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307092020: Give it to Ranni and ensure she drinks it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307092030: The dead-eyed doll lets down her guard in your presence, rather remarkably.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307092040: Though she might dip her hands in the dirt, and feign that icy personaâ€¦she's a frail, gentle girl at heart.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307092050: Though she might dip her hands in the dirt, and feign that icy persona...she's still just a feeble, pampered little girl when it comes down to it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307092060: Which is why you're the only one for the job.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307092070: Now do it. Make Ranni drink my draught.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307093010: That once you have Ranni drink my draught, my scheme will come to fruition.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307093020: And we, well, we'll be in a position to claim the very finest puppet ever crafted.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307094000: Come now, don't make me wait.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307094010: I can barely contain myself as it is...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307095000: You'll be flabbergasted, I can assure you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307095010: The scheme I promised is to be revealed very shortly...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307100010: I won't bother to ask where you pilfered it, but...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307100020: You're correct to assume I'm one of the few who can decipher it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307100030: So, I'm perfectly happy to take it off your hands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307100040: That said, don't you dare get your hopes up.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307100050: More often than not, new knowledge is merely an opportunity to reflectâ€¦
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307100060: â€¦upon the mediocrity of one's intellect.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307110010: The nightly wolf howling that's been disturbing the peace here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307110020: If that bothersome mutt, Blaidd, is back in town,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307110030: then tell him to pack up and ship out.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307110040: I never liked the din of a dog's howl.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307110050: From a mongrel like him, it's simply agony.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307120010: Are you proposing that I partake?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307120020: Do I appear such a gormless tomfool to you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307120030: A slow-wit who'd divulge his secrets for a moment of bliss?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307120040: Well, let me give you some advice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307120050: Scheming has its place, but consider the one you're scheming against.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307120060: You might find yourself on the wrong end of a proper beating one day.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307200010: Y-you! I, er, sorry, your worship...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307200020: I-I apologise for any offence given.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307200030: I am Pidia. Servant to the Carian royal family.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307200040: I am charged with maintaining these g-ghastly dolls.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307201000: Ahh, your worship, allow me to be of use.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307201001: Ahh, kind madam, allow me to be of use.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307201010: Other than the puppets, there are some very fine things up here in this storeroom.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307201020: Why not pick something out, before you go?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307201030: But please, can you offer poor ill-starred Pidia...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307201040: A little something by way of compensation?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307202000: Ah, a fine day to your worship.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307202001: Ah, kind madam, a fine day to y-you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307203000: Ah, I'm sorry your worship, but poor Pidia has given all he has.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307203001: Ah, I'm sorry kind madam, but poor Pidia has given all he has.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307203010: I can't be of further use to you. Please, forgive me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307204000: Please, find it in your heart... Forgive me...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307205030: Y-you're my puppets! I loved you with all I have!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307205070: Please, I beg you, cease this cruelty!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307210010: Poor Pidia could never accept such a precious brew.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307210020: Very sorry, really, if I... I've disappointed you,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307210030: If you will, please forget this matter entirely.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307801010: Have you forgotten that we both serve the same Lady?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.307802010: Don't you dare waltz back here ever again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309001010: Thought you'd just help yourself to a man's personal belongings?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309001020: You scheming little thief. The gods demand repentance!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309001030: Cough up your coin, all of it!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309002010: I surrender! White flag and all!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309003010: No one likes a bull-headed brute, you know!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309003020: I yield, yield! You can't harm a yielding man!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309004010: Fine, have it your way. You'll get what's coming.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309004020: We're about to make out like Bandits, boys!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309005000: Well, finally come around, have you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309005010: I knew you would. You're a man of reason, through-and-through.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309005011: I knew you would. You're a lady of reason, through-and-through.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309006010: Well, what do you know? You're Tarnished, like me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309006020: Now, how did I get that wrong?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309006030: I took you for a demi-human, or some such.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309006040: An innocent mistake, I assure you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309006050: Well, water under the bridge. Now we're squared up, how about we play nice from now on?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309007000: A true man of reason. Just what I like about you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309007001: A true lady of reason. Just what I like about you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309007020: Tarnished, like you, only, free-spirited. Nomadic, you might say.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309007030: Only for now, those retired-soldiers-turned-bandits they're paying for my gruel.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309007040: In exchange for my, well, showing them the ropes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309007050: But honestly... this looting racket is bloody terrifying.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309007060: Frankly, I'm ready to wash my hands clean. Maybe set up a legitimate shop.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309007070: So, don't be a stranger, eh?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309007080: I'll be ready to wheel and deal, come next time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309008010: What's the matter? This simply isn't like you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309008020: You've always known an innocent mistake when you see one.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309008050: Tarnished, like you, only, free-spirited. Nomadic, you might say.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309008060: Only for now, those retired-soldiers-turned-bandits are paying for my gruel.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309008070: In exchange for my, well, showing them the ropes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309008080: But honestly... this looting racket is bloody terrifying.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309008090: I'm ready to wash my hands clean. Maybe set up a legitimate shop.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309008100: So, don't be a stranger, eh?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309008110: I'll be ready to wheel and deal, come next time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309009000: Don't forget to pop back for another visit, friend.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309009010: I'll be ready to wheel and deal, come next time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309020000: Well, nice of you to drop in, finally.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309020010: It's all a bit ad hoc, but I'm sure you'll find something.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309020030: Where you won't need a refund, 'cause everything's top notch.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309021000: Hello, again. Welcome to Patches' Emporium.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309023010: Try to find it in your heart next time, eh?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309024000: Yeah, I had those bandits make a clean break.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309024010: Now they're all suppliers, and good ones at that.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309024020: I mean, they don't understand a word I'm saying,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309024030: but it hardly matters, we have a natural connection.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309024040: They're all foot soldiers. Survivors of a defeated army.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309024050: Worked to the bone by their high-and-mighty lord, only to be thrown out with the rubbish.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309024060: ...It's the same old story, everywhere I go. Ah, to hell with it all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309025000: Hm? Wondering what's inside the treasure chest?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309025010: Well, it's uh, nothing too special.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309025020: Just something I'm saving as thanks, for a very valuable customer...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309025030: But then again, it would fetch some spectacular coin...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309025040: And besides, this valuable customer could be a long time coming...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309025050: Eh? Everything is give and take, give and take.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309026000: Forgot something on your shopping list?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309041010: You've really been there for me, through thick and thin.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309041020: And so, I've made up my mind. I bequeath that chest to you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309041030: An extra-special thanks, for an extra-special customer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309042000: What's wrong? I've made up my mind.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309042010: The treasure chest is yours, in word and deed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309042020: Sure, it may be worth its weight in gold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309042030: But a Patches Promise? Well, that's priceless!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309050000: Ah, oh... How in blazes... You're alive.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309050010: You had me proper scared. Poofing away in a flash like that.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309050020: Maybe it's a sign to keep your mitts off what's not rightly yours, hmm?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309050030: But I'll forgive you. View it as a learning experience.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309050040: At any rate, it's nice just to see you safe.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309050050: And don't miss all the bargains, here at Patches' Emporium!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309051000: Ah, oh... How in blazes... You're alive.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309051010: You had me proper scared. Poofing away in a flash like that.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309051020: Who on earth spends their time booby-trapping treasure chests?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309051030: No way I could've known, but still, I apologise. It's all very unfortunate.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309051040: At any rate, it's nice just to see you safe.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309051050: And don't miss all the bargains, here at Patches' Emporium!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309060000: Oh yes, by the way. I'm saying goodbye to the old cave.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309060010: I'm untethered, by nature, and It's about time that I moved on.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309060020: No worries, the old gang will inherit the shop.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309060030: They may not speak a word, but they never forget a face.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309060040: Spare them some coin after I'm gone, eh?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309070000: Oh, well! It's been a long while.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309070020: I'm still in business, if you can believe it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309070030: Now I'm my only supplier, so I haven't got much, but everything here is top notch.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309070040: Patches' Emporium, now open in Raya Lucaria.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309071000: You have yourself a discerning eye, I can tell.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309071010: That statuette will net you a small fortune, no doubt.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309071020: In fact, I'll bet any of those scruffy merchants would leap at the chance to buy it...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309072000: Oh, really? No interest in the statuette?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309072010: I was sure it would catch your eye.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309072020: Well, I can't force it on you, but...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309072030: Incomparable craftsmanship, you know. I'd hate to see it go to someone else...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309073000: By the way, have you met that girl Rya?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309073010: I spotted her somewhere along the highroad not long ago.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309073020: She's a strange one, but I believe she was in need of help.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309073030: Not that it's any of my business, but...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309073040: If she rings your bell, why not lend her an ear?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309074000: Looking for Rya? Still hanging around on the high road, I suppose.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309080000: Oh, hello. I knew it'd all be fine...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309080010: Oh, it's nothing, don't mind me. Welcome to Patches' Emporium!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309081000: You're...making your way to the Erdtree, no?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309081010: Well I heard something that might help. A special means of reaching your destination.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309081020: Have you ever seen an iron virgin?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309081030: The clunky contraptions are whirlwinds of sickles and spiked wheels.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309081040: ...but long ago, they were endowed with a spell of transposition.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309081050: And get this. A surviving virgin sits at the bottom of the big waterwheel in the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309081070: So, right, if you get caught in it on purpose...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309081080: It'll chuck you out straight at the base of the Erdtree... Or so I'm told...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309082000: Oh yeah, great story isn't it. I'll tell you as many times as you like.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309082010: There's a surviving Iron Virgin at the bottom of the big waterwheel in the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309082020: And I heard...if you let yourself get caught in it, it'll chuck you out straight at the base of the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309090010: Hold on, don't you say a word, my friend.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309090020: I spoke no lie, not a one.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309090030: You were trapped inside a volcano, no mistake,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309090040: but the Erdtree was right outside. You just had to spring yourself out.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309090050: I'm willing to admit. I could have been more clear.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309090060: But I did not lie, and you're perfectly unscathed. All's well that ends well, right?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309101010: Strange place for a chance encounter, eh?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309101020: Thought I could use a rest. Don't mind me, go about your business.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309101030: Right, over there, see that? Something's shimmering, I swear.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309102000: What is it? Oh, don't mind me. Off you trot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309102010: Right over there, see that? Something's shimmering, I swear.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309110000: Oh, my, well, here you are again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309110010: So sorry for that. I meant to warn you, but whoops! There you went.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309110020: Despite my best intentions, I've done you wrong, I have.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309110030: But here you are, standing tall and proud. All's well that ends well, eh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309110040: And my warning was spot-on, you tell me different!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309110050: Stay clear of Volcano Manor, end of discussion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309110060: I heard the brutes there hunt Tarnished like animals.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309111000: You didn't listen last time, but I'm warning you again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309111010: Stay clear of Volcano Manor, end of discussion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309111020: I heard the brutes there hunt Tarnished like animals.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309120000: Well, you've joined the Manor, eh?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309120010: I don't believe it. Didn't think you had it in you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309120020: And here I thought Rya was barking up the wrong tree...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309120030: All good, though. We're on the same side, now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309121000: Oh, and of course, we can do business, if you like.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309121010: Patches' Emporium at the Volcano Manor. Specially for you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309131000: You're new here at the Manor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309131010: But if you complete the request, you can improve your standing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309131020: Relax, we're old friends. Time's come to pass the torch, right?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309131030: Go on, break a leg, then.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309132000: What's the matter? Having trouble nabbing your prey?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309132010: Well, I wouldn't go asking for help so soon.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309132020: We're not here to make your life easier.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309132030: Do you remember your vow to Tanith? To rise against the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309132040: Dare I say your heart was never in it to begin with?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309133040: You and Diallos both. Perhaps your hearts were never in it to begin with?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309134020: No, it's quite alright, fine work, indeed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309134040: Have some rest, by all means.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309135000: Are you surprised? That I belong to the Volcano Manor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309135010: I always hated the gibberish about lost grace and the laughable Two Fingers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309135020: I thought I could lend a hand in unmasking the charade.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309135030: Not to mention Tanith has always made me curious.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309135040: I guess her master must really be something, cause she's pretty damn smug about it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309135050: Even after announcing her blasphemous ambitions, she still stands proud.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309135060: I've never seen a woman quite like her...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309136010: Sharper than you seem, aren't you...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309136020: I was just holding onto it for you, you know.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309136030: Here you go. The reward for hunting Tragoth. All yours.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309150000: Now you've gone and killed Rykard?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309150020: Cripes, you make this nonsense seem, well, less nonsensical...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309150030: Perhaps a Tarnished will be Elden Lord after all...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309150040: But for now, this Manor is finished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309150050: The demigod beast is slain, and Tanith has lost her head.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309150060: A fine mess, but how else could it end when daddy ambition is head over heels courting lady blasphemy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309150080: Well, here I am. Untethered, once again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309151010: Oh, come to make a parting donation to Patches' Emporium?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309160010: A shame you had to see me like this...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309160020: Ohh, I had a bit of a slip-up, that's all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309160030: I should have stuck to what I know best...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309160040: No matter. I know I-I can trust you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309160050: Gullible, yes, but a good soul.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309160060: Make certain that Tanith gets this.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309160070: Oh, it's nothing, it's just... Makes me sick to see her all bent out of shape.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309160080: C'mon, Tanith, back on your high horse, where you belong.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309161010: Then I can rest easy, my friend...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309170010: Thought you'd just help yourself to a man's personal belongings?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309170020: You scheming little thief. The gods demand repentance!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309170030: Cough up your coin, all of it!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309171000: Hm? Wait, don't tell me, is that you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309171020: I surrender! I surrender, I swear!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309172000: Do you even hear me? I said "surrender", loud and clear!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309172010: No one likes a bull-headed brute!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309172020: You'd clobber your old mate, then, would you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309173010: What in the world has gotten into you!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309173020: Fine, have it your way. You'll get what's coming.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309173030: Don't go thinking I'm a soft touch!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309174000: Well, glad to see we're on the same page.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309174010: I'd never cross you, not even close.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309175010: It's been ages since I've seen you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309175020: I didn't even realise it was you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309175030: Took you for a demi-human, or some such.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309175040: You know how it is, just an innocent mistake.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309175050: Water under the bridge, eh, back to business as usual?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309176010: This bandit business is hardly what it's cracked up to be...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309176020: Especially if we keep running into the likes of you...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309176030: ...Maybe I'll set up another shop with the lads...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309177000: ...Maybe I'll set up another shop with the lads...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309190000: Well, finally made it, eh, and just in time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309190010: For the grand reopening of Patches' Emporium.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309190020: Where you won't need a refund, 'cause everything is top notch!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309191000: Hello, again. Welcome to Patches' Emporium.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309193000: What, do I have to beg?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309193010: Give us a coin or two next time around, will you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309194000: Forgot something on your shopping list?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309200000: Booze, eh? Good stuff, by the look of it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309200020: As my dear nan used to say, "there's no such thing as a free lunch"...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309801000: What are you playing at? That bloody well hurts!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309803000: Ugh. Hard of hearing, are we?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309804000: Fine, have it your way. You'll get what's coming!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309804010: Don't go thinking I'm a soft touch!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309810000: Well... It was bound to happen some day...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309820010: Try not to be so slow on the uptake, eh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309821010: There's a special circle, for rotten thieves like you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309830000: Well, it looks like you've seen the error of your ways.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309830020: Water under the bridge. Am I wrong?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309830030: We'll call it a momentary lapse of judgment. "All's well", as you know.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309830040: So, what can I do you for today?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309840000: Okay, I can see you mean it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309840010: Consider it water under the bridge.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309840020: A momentary lapse of judgment. "All's well", as you know.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.309841000: So. Do you need something from me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310001010: Might I bend your ear for a moment, please.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310001020: My name is Irina. I've escaped from Castle Morne, to the south.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310001040: I-I can't be sure what it is; my eyesight's been weak since birth you see...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310001050: But I swear I heard frightful howling from all over.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310001060: My good father secreted me out the castle,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310001070: but decided himself to stay. He says it's his duty, as commander.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310002010: I fear some of the castle's servants are still prowling nearby.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310002020: Do take care on the road. I pray your journey comes to fruition.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310002030: And if you happen to change your mind...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310002040: Please come to see me again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310003010: Ah, you're the one from before, aren't you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310003030: Would you mind taking a letter to my father, at the castle?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310003040:
My sole wish is that he escape,
even if his honour should be the price.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310003050: Please...I just need him to be safe...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310004030: Deliver it to my father, who remains in the castle, if you please.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310005000: Please, if you wouldn't mind. Deliver the letter to my father at the castle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310005010: He can be stubborn, but I'm sure he'll come around.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310006010: The servants are full wroth. Filled with hatred for every one of us.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310006020:
They've since come for every one of the companions I escaped with.
They haven't spared a soul.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310006030: I fear it's no different at Castle Morne...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310006050: Would you mind taking a letter to my father, at the castle?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310006060:
My sole wish is that he escape,
even if his honour should be the price.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310006070: Please...I just want him to be safe...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310010010: My name is Hyetta, and I'm journeying in search of the distant light.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310010020: If I might be so bold as to ask...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310010030: Would you donate any Shabriri grapes in your possession to me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310010040:
My eyesight has been weak since birth, you see.
I can't tell which way I'm supposed to go next.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310010050:
But when I eat one of those grapes, I can feel a distant light
in the back of my eyes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310010070: It will lead me, to my true duty, as a Finger Maiden.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310011010: Would you donate any Shabriri grapes in your possession to me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310011020: I'm on a pilgrimage in search of the distant light.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310011030:
And when I eat one of those grapes, I can feel the light
in the back of my eyes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310012010: Now I can feel the distant light once more.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310012030: May the blessing of the Fingers be upon you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310013000: You're not like the others who give me grapes, are you...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310013010: They rest their trembling hands upon me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310013020: Howling wordlessly, they gently stroke my eyes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310013030: Their frail fingers, emaciated... Yet still, they give me the grapes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310014010: Now I can feel the distant light once more.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310014020: That aside, I wonder what Shabriri grapes really are?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310014030: Delectably tender and sweet, yet searing...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310014040: What a sight they must be to behold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310015010: Not all of those people... Their own...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310015020: So those noises I heard were...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310017000: Ah, is that you over there?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310017010: I've gleaned something very important indeed, thanks to you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310017020: The reason why it was eyes I had to eat.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310017030: The distant light is far and frail.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310017040: So faint it can't be seen by the naked eye.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310017050: But with everyone's eyes together, it appears.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310017070: I'm certain now. I will be a Finger Maiden.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310019010: May the blessing of the Fingers be upon you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310020010: May the blessing of the Fingers be upon you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310021000: I wonder, what are Shabriri grapes?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310021010: Delectably tender and sweet, yet searing...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310021020: What a sight they must be to behold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310022000: I apologise. You only did as I asked.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310022010: I'll be fine. Think no more of it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310023000: I've gleaned something very important indeed, thanks to you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310023010: I'm certain now. I will be a Finger Maiden.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310030000: Oh hello, is that you over there?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310030010: Have you ever heard of fingerprint grapes?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310030020:
They're special grapes which only grow on those
who've been clasped by the burnt Fingers...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310030030: I would truly love to try one...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310030040: The distant light seems far closer than before,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310030050: But I can't sense a thing from the usual grapes anymore...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310030060: Please, could you donate a fingerprint grape to me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310030070: Without one I don't know, I feel like I might go mad.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310031010: A fingerprint grape, tried and true, what a wondrous thing! A fingerprint grape!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310031020: Ohh, how sweet, yet, how it burns...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310031030: Thank you. I've composed myself again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310031040: May the blessing of the Fingers be upon you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310032010: ...Might I ask a boon of you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310032020: Look after this for me, if you please.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310032030:
It's been so long, I don't know how I came upon it,
but I've been looking for its owner.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310032040: Now I'm to be a Maiden though, it'll never find its way home.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310032050: Which is why I'd like you to have it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310032060: It must be very, very precious indeed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310033000:
They're special grapes which only grow on those
who've been clasped by the burnt Fingers...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310033010: Please, could you donate a fingerprint grape to me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310033020: Without one I don't know, I feel like I might go mad.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310034000: Thank you from the bottom of my heart.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310034010: I'm sure I'll be a Finger Maiden.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310040000: Ah, so you're here as well, are you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310040020: I'll be a Maiden, and you... Surely, a Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310040030: Go to the door ahead, after divesting yourself of your possessions.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310040040: It will surely open, and the Three Fingers will welcome you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310040050: May the flame of chaos find purchase within you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310041000: Go to the door ahead, after divesting yourself of your possessions.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310041010: It will surely open, and the Three Fingers will welcome you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310050000: Ahh, the flame of chaos has nestled within you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310050010: Could you please rest your hand upon me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310050020: Burn me with the flame, to make me your maiden...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310051010: My eyes, my eyes, they're melting...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310052000: Could you please rest your hand upon me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310052010: Burn me with the flame, to make me your maiden...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310053020: I have touched them. The words of the Three Fingers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310053030: As your maiden, allow me to divine them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310053040: All that there is came from the One Great.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310053050: Then came fractures, and births, and souls.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310053060: But the Greater Will made a mistake.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310053070: Torment, despair, affliction. Every sin, every curse.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310053080: Every one, born of the mistake.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310053090: And so, what was borrowed must be returned.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310053100: Melt it all away, with the yellow chaos flame.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310054000: Those who gave me grapes howled without words.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310054010: Saying they wished they were never born.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310054030: Take their torment, despair. Their affliction. Every sin, every curse.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310054040: And melt it all away. As the Lord of Chaos.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310054050: No more fractures. No more birth...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.310802010: I do not wish to cause anyone harm.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311001000: Ah, there's a face I've not seen before.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311001010: I'm Edgar, warden of this castle as ordained by Lord Godrick himself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311001020: But you can see how things have turned out.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311001040:
They gave me good service, or so I thought,
but it seems it was all an act.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311001050:
Foul creatures, as it's said.
And true enough they're foul inside and out.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311001070:
But whatever you've come here to do,
I'm afraid Castle Morne won't hold much longer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311001080: Take this, by way of apology.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311002010: You've no reason to risk your neck dawdling here, eh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311003010: Thank you. I'm in your debt.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311003030: Even if the castle should fall, as commander, I must remain.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311003040: To ensure the treasured sword of Morne does not fall into the wrong hands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311004000: If you see Irina, do tell her.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311004010: That her father will come for her, once he's fulfilled his duty.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311010010: For keeping the sword from those fallen creatures.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311010020: I'm no longer bound by duty.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311010030: Once I've rescued Irina, I will spend my remaining days with her.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311011000: Thanks to you, I will be reunited with Irina.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311011010: And devote my remaining days to her.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311011020: Irina has a gentle nature, though.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311011030: I only hope it remains intact.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311020040: I chose duty over my daughter's safety.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311020050: And that is how fate has answeredâ€¦
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311021010: The foul wretches responsible for this.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311021020: I'll hunt them down, and exterminate every last one of them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311021030: Rest assured, Irina. It will be done.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311801010: We need not fight, I assure you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311802000: I haven't a clue what's got into you,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311802010: but as Lord of this castle, I will stand for it no longer!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311803000: And now even your ilk have complicated matters.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311804010: What was the purpose of such folly?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311812010: You had a hand in Irina's undoing!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311812020: What could she have done to deserve that?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311813010: I will not rest until they are eliminated.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.311814010: I will join you soon enoughâ€¦
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312001010: How did you slip inside, with the gate closed?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312001030: If you can fell one of them, you're a champion, in my book.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312001040: I am Jerren. Foolish old warrior, and witness.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312001050: Incidentally, do you like a good festival, from time to time?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312001060: Well, it's true, this fortress houses only the vanquished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312001070: But when the stars align, we celebrate.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312001080: A war festival honoring the last battle and death of General Radahn,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312001090: the mightiest demigod of the Shattering, and bearer of a Great Rune.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312002010: As you should. The festival affords glory to warriors.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312002020: Then all you need is a little patience.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312002030: When the stars align, the festival will be declared.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312003000: Well, you're not much fun, are you, chum?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312003010: No matter. One day you will see.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312003020: That true warriors bask in glory at the festival.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312004010: When the stars align, the festival will be declared.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312005010: This old geezer hasn't any use for you just yet.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312006000: One day you will see, chum.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312006010: That true warriors bask in glory at the festival.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312007010: This old geezer hasn't any use for you just yet.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312020000: Well, I haven't heard that name in an age.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312020010: Then you must serve Princess Ranni?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312020020: The next time you speak to Iji, tell him this:
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312020030: The festival of Radahn will surely set Ranni's fate back into motion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312020040: By the byâ€¦ Is that old fool still hammering out weapons?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312020050: His enormous frame, cramped in that little place...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312020060: Bit of a haughty sort. Strange fella, when I knew him.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312020070: And funny thing, his swords were all blunt as stone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312020080: But not one of them decayed when faced with the scarlet rot...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312030010: The stars have aligned! The festival is nigh!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312030020: General Radahn, mightiest demigod of the Shattering, awaits you!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312030030: Champions, prepare for battle! Defeat the General, claim glory, and grab that Great Rune!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312030040: A celebration of war! The Radahn Festival!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312031000: Are you good and prepared, young chum?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312034000: But now, we must make merry.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312034010: O gathering of champions, the revels begin!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312034020: The celebration of war! The Radahn Festival!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312035000: You will find the field of battle past the church ahead, upon the shore under the fort.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312035010: General Radahn is there, even now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312035020: Divested of his wits, devouring corpsesâ€¦
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312036010: When you are ready, come to me again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312040000: At last, the war festival has ended.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312040010: Brave champion, you have our gratitude.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312040020: The celebration was spectacular. General Radahn is surely pleased.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312040030: Festering with rot, and crippled by madness, all he wanted was an honourable death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312041010: I am no longer bound to this fortress.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312041020: I have a task in mind.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312041030: Old business you could say. You wouldn't understand.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312041040: May we meet again, if the fates deign it. Brave champion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312042000: It's time I went on my way.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312042010: May we meet again, if the fates deign it. Brave champion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312050010: I hardly expected to see the champion of the festival here of all places.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312050030: Well, whatever the case, she's dead now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312050050: She was known as the Graven Witch.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312050060: Obsessed by the primeval current, countless sorcerers fell to her hand.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312050070: The most dangerous mage in the entire history of Raya Lucaria's Academy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312052010: The woman, she was like a husk, her soul already fled.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312052020: I suspect Sellen lives on, elsewhere.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312052030: I'm sure she'll turn up eventually, in another body.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312052040: A sickening thought, but one that won't stop gnawing at me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312053000: I suspect Sellen lives on, elsewhere.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312053010: I'm sure she'll turn up eventually, in another body.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312053020: A sickening thought, but one that won't stop gnawing at me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312060000: My thanks, for the aid given.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312060010: I heard from Iji that Lady Ranni might have found herself a champion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312060020: But I didn't know he was talking about you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312060030: You've helped me fulfil an old promise.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312060040: This is the least I can do for you. Please, take it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312061000: My thanks, for the aid given.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312061010: Always a pleasure to witness the festival champ put on a display.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312061020: You've helped me fulfil an old promise.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312061030: This is the least I can do for you. Please, take it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312062000: My thanks, Tarnished, for the aid given.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312062010: You've helped me fulfil an old promise.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312062020: This is the least I can do for you. Please, take it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312063000: Well, I must be leaving now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312063010: Brave warrior, if the fates deign it...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312063020: No, we shall indeed meet again, at the next glorious tourney.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312064000: Well, I must be leaving now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312064010: If the fates deign it, may we meet again, Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312801010: If the Graven Witch put you under her spell, you must be eliminated...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312801020: Before you can pose a threat to Caria.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312802000: Rest now. Alongside the witch's corpse.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312804000: Sellen, Graven Witch, enemy of Caria.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312804010: I vow this time to crush both your frame and your primal glintstone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.312804020: I am Jerren, bringer of your death. Do not forget.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313003010: It's rather chilly here, isn't it?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313003020: My mistress sent me off on an errand...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313003030: But I was accosted by a ruffian, and now I'm in a bind.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313003040: Could I ask you lend a hand, perhaps?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313003050: That thug made off with a precious necklace. I need someone to retrieve it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313003060: I would be sure to provide ample reward.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313003080: If you've any qualms confronting your own, I shall find another...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313004010: What a blessing that we've met like this.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313004020: The thug should be resting at an abandoned home down the way...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313004030: Please, I must have the necklace back.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313005000: Yes, I see. Most unfortunate, but I'll have to make do.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313005010: I know that some Tarnished balk at the thought of harming their own.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313005020: But if you should change your mind, do not hesitate to speak to me again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313006000: Have you had a change of heart?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313007000: The thug should be resting at an abandoned home down the way...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313007010: Please, I must have the necklace back.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313010000: Oh, yes, that is my missing necklace.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313010010: Thank you kindly. I am in your debt.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313010020: Did I forget to announce myself?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313010030: I am Rya, in the service of Lady Tanith of the Volcano Manor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313010040: I seek stalwart Tarnished who might join our house.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313010050: You are very brave yourself. Not only a steady hand,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313010060: but a steady heart, merciless, even to your own kind.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313010070: Such strength is precisely what my mistress seeks.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313010090: Brave Tarnished, seek the Altus Plateau, the realm of the Erdtree.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313010100: Most Tarnished are doomed to wander the outskirts of the Lands Between, peering wistfully at the towering Erdtree...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313010110: But you are no ordinary Tarnished. And once that is proven,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313010120: the Volcano Manor will fully extend its invitation. To fight, amongst a family of champions.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313011000: Ohh, and... One more thing, only for you...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313011010: This land of Liurnia is connected to the Altus Plateau by the Grand Lift of Dectus, beyond the High Road.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313011020: But the lift has been defunct for an age, meaning there's no simple means of passage.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313011030: Instead, you must seek the old ruins in the cliff.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313011040: At the base of the valley near the Grand Lift, there's an old tunnel.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313011050: It was excavated from both ends, linking Liurnia to the Altus Plateau.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313011060: I have faith in you. A champion, through and through.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313011070: I do hope that we can meet again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313012010: I knew you had the stuff of champions.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313012020: I hereby invite you to the Volcano Manor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313012030: Take my hand, and have audience with my mistress.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313012040: I will pray. That you follow the same path as Lady Tanith.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313013000: I will pray. That you will follow the same path as Lady Tanith.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313014010: Speak to me again once you are ready.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313015010: I hereby invite you to the Volcano Manor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313015020: Take my hand, and have audience with my mistress.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313015030: I will pray. That you will follow the same path as Lady Tanith.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313016010: I will pray. That you follow the same path as Lady Tanith.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313020020: But I hardly hold him in high regard.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313020030: He seems to bear animosity toward the Volcano Manor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313020040: Perhaps it is to be expected, only...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313020050: his intent, while vicious, is also tenuous, as if his heart is not in it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313020060: Doesn't really seem like champion material, to me...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313021000: Brave Tarnished, what is your business here?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313021010: I'm afraid this is not a guest room.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313021020: What's that peculiar look upon your face?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313021040: Goodness, am I still a serpent?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313021080: I ought to be thanking you for treating me as usual, despite this appearance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313021100: This is my true form. My real name is Zorayas.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313021120: Do understand. This duplicity is my own doing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313021130: Lady Tanith speaks no falsehoods, and the Volcano Manor is just as it seems.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313022010: I am told I was born by the grace of a glorious king.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313022020: That my mother cherishes this form I inhabit.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313022030: I am proud of what I am.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313022040: But people are cruel. If they saw my true form, they wouldn't speak to me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313022050: And so I assume a guise when seeking new recruits.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313022060: But you are not like the rest.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313023000: My serpentine form, and the name Zorayas,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313023010: were secrets known only to Lady Tanith and I.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313023020: Now I share the secrets with you, as well.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313023030: Please keep them safe from anyone else.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313024000: Seek the old ruins in the cliff.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313024010: At the base of the valley near the Grand Lift, there's an old tunnel.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313024020: It was excavated from both ends, linking Liurnia to the Altus Plateau.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313024030: I have faith in you. A champion, through and through.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313024040: I do hope that we can meet again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313030010: As a scout, I am pleased to see you again here at the Volcano Manor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313030020: Under Lady Tanith's guidance, may you tread the path of valour.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313031010: heard any strange sounds here at the manor?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313031020: Something beyond the walls, like breathing, or slithering scales...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313031030: Oh fie, what am I saying?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313031040: It just isn't possible. I must be tired.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313032010: Forgive me. My mind never ceases to churn of late.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313032030: I know I can trust you...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313032040: I saw something, slithering in the pitch black of night.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313032050: It entered the room across the hall, and never came out.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313032070: it took the form of a serpent, just like me...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313032080: Does the Volcano Manor hide some secret,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313032090: that Lady Tanith has kept from me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313032100: I realise that I shouldn't impose but,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313032110: if you discover anything, would you please share?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313032120: It entered the room next to this one, and never came out.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313033000: The serpent that lurked in the shadows that night...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313033010: It entered the room across the hall, and never came out.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313033020: Perhaps the manor yet holds some secrets.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313033030: If you discover anything, would you please share?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313033040: It entered the room next to this one, and never came out.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313034010: Oh, so there was a secret after all...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313034030: Lady Tanith, my own mother, has deceived me...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313034050: born by the grace of a king?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313035010: It is a shame that I did not beckon you here with my own hand,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313035020: but I am pleased that we meet again, here at the Volcano Manor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313035030: Under Lady Tanith's guidance, may you tread the path of valour.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313036010: Do you remember me? I am Rya. We spoke once in Liurnia.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313036020: I am pleased that we meet again, here at the Volcano Manor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313036030: Under Lady Tanith's guidance, may you tread the path of valour.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313037000: A pleasure to meet you. Brave Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313037010: I am Rya, the scout. Very pleased to welcome you to the Volcano Manor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313037020: Under Lady Tanith's guidance, may you tread the path of valour.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313038010: Under Lady Tanith's guidance, may you tread the path of valour.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313039000: Sometimes I hear strange sounds beyond the walls.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313039020: Oh, perhaps I'm just feeling tired.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313040040: I am certain of it. I was born inside this.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313040050: It's a part of my birth mother.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313040070: Thanks to you, I am no longer afraid.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313040080: I want to know. How I was born, and met Lady Tanith.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313040090: One day, I hope to call her mother once again, this time from the bottom of my heart.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313041000: Lady Tanith, my own mother, has deceived me...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313041020: born by the grace of a king?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313042000: I want to know. How I was born, and met Lady Tanith.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313042010: One day, I hope to call her mother once again, this time from the bottom of my heart.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313050010: I'm afraid... there is something I must tell you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313050020: I was an unwanted child. Born not of grace, but of a hideous ritual.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313050030: Something that can never be accepted, not by men, nor serpents.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313050040: Even Lady Tanith shouldn't accept me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313050050: You are very brave yourself. Not only a steady hand,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313050060: but a steady heart, merciless, even to your own kind.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313050070: I know that you have done so much for me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313050080: But I wish to ask one last kindness.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313050100: I thought that I feared nothing. But this...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313050110: Free me from this accursed frame.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313052010: Yes, of course. You always were very kind.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313060000: I know that you have done so much for me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313060010: But I wish to ask one last kindness.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313060030: I thought that I feared nothing. But this...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313060040: Free me from this accursed frame.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313061000: You're not willing to kill me, are you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313061020: You've always been so kind. And uncompromising.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313062000: I suppose I knew in my heart of hearts.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313062010: How kind, and uncompromising, you always were.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313071020: but Lady Tanith, and all the Tarnished champions, are gone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313071030: It feels rather quiet without them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313071040: But with you here, things will be just fine.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313072010: I am her daughter, born by the grace of a great king.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313072020: I do not wish to burden her, or cause concern.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313072030: Brave Tarnished. Do tread the path of valour.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313072040: I'm certain that this is what Lady Tanith wishes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313800010: You will only tire by striking this barrier.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313801000: Besides, I am no foe of yours.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.313802000: I see that you have reconsidered.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314001000: Ah, hello. You must be new here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314001030: The honor of one's house holds little import in these lands.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314001040: By the way, have you met a young woman named Lanya on your travels?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314001050: She's my servant, but fickle as the wind.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314001060: Take your eyes off her for but a moment and she's good as gone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314001070: If you find her, please be sure to tell me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314002000: Be sure to tell me if you meet a young woman named Lanya.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314002010: She's a servant to my house.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314002020: She's been my companion since childhood.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314002030: I've lost count of the number of times I've had to find her like this.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314002040: Honestly, she's such a little tomboy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314010010: It's me, Diallos. Answer me, would you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314011000: Hello, friend. Tell me if you know, would you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314011010:
The whereabouts of the hidden house of those despicable fiends.
The recusants who hunt their fellow Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314011020:
They laid hands upon my servant Lanya,
and I refuse to let the insult stand.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314011030: "The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314011040: I, Diallos, swear to deliver the message.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314012020:
Can you believe they invited me to join them?
Now! After what they did...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314012030: I can scarcely believe it myself. Do they think me a fool?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314012040: You might be surprised to learn I took them up on the offer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314012050: Then I only had to ask. The location of the recusant hideout.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314012060:
It's on Mt. Gelmir, found off the old road that leads west
from the town of windmills.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314012070: That's where they hide. The manor on the peak.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314012090: You'll rue the day you insulted my name by laying hands on Lanya.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314012100: "The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood" after all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314013010: Hmph, never mind. But tell me if you know, would you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314013020:
The whereabouts of the hidden house of those despicable fiends.
The recusants who hunt their fellow Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314013030:
They laid hands upon my servant Lanya,
and I refuse to let the insult stand.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314013040: "The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314013050: I, Diallos, swear to deliver the message.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314014000:
They laid hands upon my servant Lanya,
and I refuse to let the insult stand.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314014010: "The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood."
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314014020: I, Diallos, swear to deliver the message.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314015000:
It's on Mt. Gelmir, found off the old road that leads west
from the town of windmills.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314015010: That's where they hide. The manor on the peak.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314015030: "The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood" after all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314020000: Ah. Oh... I-it's you, is it?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314020010: Well. Nice to see you again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314020020: So you've been invited as well, I see.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314020030:
Then we're comrades in arms, henceforth.
You watch my back, and I'll watch yours, yes?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314021000: I, um, I can tell... You're wondering about Lanya...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314021020: After much internal debate, I've come to realise...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314021050: I've got the stuff of champions.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314021060: And champions, ironic as it is, are oft forced to walk a tainted path.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314021070: It hit me like a bolt from the blue...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314021080: That my former thoughts were simple naivetÃ©.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314021090: Of course, my heart weeps for Lanya.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314021100: That unfortunate incident was a cruel twist of fate indeed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314021110:
But succumbing to the pain and sadness caused won't
make me a champion, will it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314021120: Lanya knows this, I'm certain. Fate has laid hard roads for us both.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314021130: But such is true of any road trod by champions.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314022010: Their pale complexion, a far cry from any warrior's. The shame of House Hoslow.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314022020: But that won't be the case for long.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314022030: They'll be darkened by grit, once I've set out on the path of champions.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314022040: "The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood" after all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314030010: I'm terribly sorry, but would you mind giving me some time to myself?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314030020: I haven't achieved anything at all thus far.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314030030: Even though I've dirtied my hands time and time again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314030040: I'm still yet to achieve anything.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314030050: Perhaps I am a fool after all...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314030060:
No. It's worse than that. As things stand I've given up on the
path of revenge and sullied the name of my house.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314030070: What an easy mark I must have been...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314030080: How did it take me so long to realise, honestly...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314030090: There's just no end to my foolishness, is there...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314031000: It's just as my noble brother says.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314031010:
I'm a complete fool. I can't believe I thought I could become
a champion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314032000: Perhaps I am a fool after all...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314032010:
No. It's worse than that. As things stand I've given up on the
path of revenge and sullied the name of my house.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314032020: What an easy mark I must have been...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314040000: Well. Aren't you full of beans.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314040010: No wonder you're covered in muck.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314041000: Oh? My friend, it's been far too long.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314041010: I have to say you caught me at a rather low point.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314041020: But...as you see, I've put all that behind me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314041030:
Left the Volcano Manor. Forging my own path now.
Making my own choices.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314041040: Even a fool like me can look after some simple jars.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314041050:
Do you pity me? Well don't. I feel like for the first time
in my life I'm on the straight and narrow.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314042000: A fool I may be, but I can look after some simple jars.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314042010:
Do you pity me? Well don't. I feel like for the first time
in my life I'm on the straight and narrow.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314052010: This fool proved his worth, in the end...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314053020: I've been a fool...to the last...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314800010: What on earth was that for!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314801000: Now I see. You're a wretched recusant!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314801010: May you rue the day that you thought to trample me!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314801020: The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314802000: Lanya, your honour has been restored.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314802010: As a charge of House Hoslow, you can rest easy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314803010: I am the shame of House Hoslow after all...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314810020: I've no quarrel with the Volcano Manor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314810030: I will never brandish a sword again, I swear!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314811010: Wait, you're a poacher, aren't you?
