N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314811020: I'll turn my back on duty no more.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.314811030: The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316001000: Tarnished, are we? A wonder you should turn up here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316001010: I am Sellen, a sorcerer, quite plainly.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316002000: Ahh, a yen for glintstone sorceries?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316002020: But one must choose one's masters wisely.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316002030: I was exiled from the Academy of Raya Lucaria,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316002050: Do you still wish to learn from me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316003000: Well, you are a piece of work.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316003010: Very well. You are now my protÃ©gÃ© in glintstone sorcery.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316003020: But I refuse to coddle. Or cast kind words. Never.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316004010: It's not every day I meet a Tarnished just milling about.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316005000: What is it now? Why are you here again?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316006010: You are quite the enigma, aren't you...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316007000: I dare say your proclivities are far from ideal...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316007010: Oh well, perhaps nurture will defy nature, with a bit of luck.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316008000: Yes, I think that would be wise.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316008010: We must choose our masters wisely.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316009000: Well? Have you made up your mind?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316010010: You are a tadpole when it comes to magic. Infantile. Without the legs to walk.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316010020: So, to become a sorcerer, first, you must face your ignorance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316012000: You wish to continue the lesson?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316012010: Very well, I have time aplenty.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316020000: Our art draws upon the powers embedded in glintstone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316020010: But what is the nature of such power?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316020020: Glintstone is the amber of the cosmos.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316020030: Golden amber contains the remnants of ancient life, and houses its vitality,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316020040: while glintstone contains residual life, and thus the vitality of the stars.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316020060: that glintstone sorcery is the study of the stars, and the life therein.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316020070: A fact lost on most sorcerers, these days...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316021000: Your appetite for learning is impressive.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316021010: You make me proud. To have grown little legs so readily.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316021020: You must have a fabulous teacher.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316031010: Seluvis is not a name I ever wanted to hear again...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316031020: But, fine. If it will help you, my apprentice, I offer my knowledge.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316031030: The stars alter the fate of the Carian royal family. And the fate of your mistress, Ranni.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316031040: But long ago, General Radahn challenged the swirling constellations, and in a crushing victory, arrested their cycles.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316031050: Now, he is the force that repulses the stars.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316031060: If General Radahn were to die, the stars would resume their movement.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316031070: And so, too, would Ranni's destiny.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316040000: My apprentice, what happened to your nail?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316040010: Perhaps you have a different view, but...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316040020: That foul thing is eyeing you from afar, plotting to enlist you as a pawn.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316040030: May I remove it for you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316041000: A wise choice. Let me neutralize it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316041030: This is a vile craft in which you engage.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316041050: This is the beloved apprentice of Sellen, Graven Witch.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316041060: I set a curse upon you and your meddling hand.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316041070: Your death will not be a pleasant one.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316041080: May you shudder between breaths in your sleep...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316042000: If you prefer not, that is your prerogative.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316042020: That foul thing is eyeing you from afar, plotting to enlist you as a pawn.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316042030: If what I have told you one day rings true,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316042040: by all means, come to me again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316050010: Ah, then you have seen Master Azur.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316050020: Master Azur was a founding glintstone sorcerer, and my first teacher.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316050030: A stern judge of men, but he must see something in you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316050050: We can speak more later, my apprentice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316060000: If you recall, I was exiled from the Academy of Raya Lucaria.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316060010: It was for attempting to restore the primeval current of glintstone sorcery.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316060020: The toothless pedantry peddled by the Carian royal family can rot for all I care.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316060030: I want glintstone sorceries that open our minds, unbound by terrestrial taboos.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316060040: No matter what we give in return.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316060060: Teacher and student are not bound to tread the same path.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316060070: But hear me out, my apprentice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316060080: I need your help to restore the primeval current of glintstone sorcery.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316060090: Perhaps this is a journey we could take together?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316061010: This pleases me. It's been far too long since I found a fellow kindred spirit.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316061020: You must have a fabulous teacher.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316062000: Forgive me, it was an outlandish idea to begin with.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316062010: And I fear quite presumptuous of me, as well.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316062020: Don't give it another thought, my apprentice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316063010: You must have given this quite some thought.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316063020: Splendid. I thank you. This pleases me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316063030: It's been far too long since I found a fellow kindred spirit.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316065000: You wish to resume the lesson?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316065010: Indeed, that would be the wiser option.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316070000: I need your help, my apprentice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316070010: Master Lusat is another founding glintstone sorcerer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316070020: And like Master Azur, he was banished from the academy. Now he languishes, imprisoned somewhere.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316070030: My apprentice, can you find Master Lusat?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316070040: With this glintstone key, you should be able to cross the boundary that encloses him.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316071000: I need him to restore the primeval current of glintstone sorcery.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316071010: He's nigh a child of the stars, such is his body now...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316072000: After his expulsion from the academy, I heard that Master Lusat returned to his home.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316072010: A place called Sellia, in the eastern Caelid Wilds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316072020: Thinking about it, I obtained the glintstone key I gave you from a Sellian sorcerer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316072030: It wouldn't be too much of a leap to suppose he's still cooped up nearby...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316080000: Who could've guessed. What a place to find Master Lusat...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316080010: You have my gratitude. This is all your work.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316080020: I am truly pleased to have you as an apprentice, and a kindred spirit.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316080030: This is a mere token of my thanks. Please, take it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316080040: This brings us a full step closer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316080050: The bodies of Masters Azur and Lusat can be admitted to the Academy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316080060: If only I could undo these wretched shackles...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316081000: This brings us a full step closer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316081010: The bodies of Masters Azur and Lusat can be admitted to the academy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316081020: If only I could undo these wretched shackles...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316090000: My apprentice. Give me a moment later.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316090010: I have a favour to ask.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316090020: The form you see before you is merely a projection.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316090030: My body lies elsewhere. But the academy's shackles prevent it being moved.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316090040: My body is on the Weeping Peninsula, at the southern tip of the Lands Between,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316090050: imprisoned in the ruins just down from the Church of Marika, past the plain of the Wandering Mausoleum.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316090060: Can you make the journey to my body?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316090070: I have something that I can only trust with you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316092000: My body is on the Weeping Peninsula, at the southern tip of the Lands Between,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316092010: imprisoned in the ruins just down from the Church of Marika, past the plain of the Wandering Mausoleum.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316092020: Can you make the journey to my body?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316092030: I have something that I can only trust with you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316100000: My apprentice, thank you for coming.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316100010: These shackles take a toll on us all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316100020: There is something I need you to look after.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316101000: A star has fallen, and my fortunes waver.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316101010: Someone may come for my life. And so, I entrust it with you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316103030: This...is my essence. Please, treat it with care.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316104030: It will do no good, I swear it...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316104040: ...and yet you persist, you frothing degenerates...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316105000: Treat it with care, my apprentice...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316105010: What you hold is my very being...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316110000: My apprentice, just how long has it been?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316110010: Thank you. You've helped me fill a new body, once again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316110020: And it's truly a gem. Young and full of vigor, a snug fit for my Primal Glintstone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316110030: Better still, I've shed those awful shackles.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316110040: Finally, I can return to the academy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316110050: To expel the Carian royal family, and restore the primeval current.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316110060: My dear apprentice, I owe this all to you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316111000: Finally, I can return to the academy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316111010: To expel the Carian royal family, and restore the primeval current.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316112000: My apprentice, shall we commence the lesson?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316112010: As thanks for procuring this new form, I'll be holding you to a higher standard.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316113000: You wish to resume the lesson?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316113010: Have I not been strict enough, I wonder?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316120010: You've saved my skin once again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316120020: Do you see this? The Queen of Caria is no more.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316120030: With the bodies of Masters Azur and Lusat returned, the academy can hone the primeval current.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316120040: So that we, fallen children of the stars, shall beam with brilliance once again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316120050: My apprentice. Will you stay with us, here at the academy?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316120060: Oh, I know it's not possible.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316120070: You have your own calling. To be the next Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316120090: Of your teacher. On the eve of your crowning.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316120100: You will always be my darling pupil.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316120120: No, the entire academy, will swear allegiance to the new monarch.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316121010: but here is a symbol of my allegiance, and the academy's.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316122000: Do you recall what once I told you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316122010: That glintstone is the amber of the cosmos, and sorcery is the study of the stars, and the life therein.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316122020: When you become Elden Lord, please illuminate me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316122030: Lay bare the secrets of life which course the Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316122040: Next time, I will be your student.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316123010: If you fail to claim your throne,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316123020: you can always pay me a visit.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316123030: Oh, don't fret. Even my dullest pupils will always have a place here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316126000: Ahh, I am glad to see you. My apprentice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316126010: Would you like a lesson? I'm always glad to further your education.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316127000: It warms my heart. That you still think of me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316127010: Yet I still yearn, for you to find Master Lusat.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316127020: His body is needed. At the academy, to hone the primeval current...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316128000: Who could've guessed. What a place to find Master Lusat...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316128010: Oh, this is wonderful news. Now, his body will be brought home.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316128020: And when the bodies of Masters Azur and Lusat are together, the academy can hone the primeval current.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316128030: So that we, fallen children of the stars, will beam once again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316128040: I am most grateful. There are no others who would have done this.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316128050: What a joy to have you as an apprentice, and kindred spirit.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316128060: This is a mere token of my thanks. Please, take it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316129000: You wish to resume the lesson?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316129010: Good. Indeed, it is better to finish what one starts, is it not?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316129030: With the body of Master Azur returned, the academy can restore the primeval current.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316129040: So that we, fallen children of the stars, might beam with brilliance once again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316130010: You have my gratitude. For freeing me from my shackles.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316130020: But I am afraid your work is done.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316130030: Join the school. To reflect on your mistake.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316150000: Oh, is that a scroll? Takes me back to my academy days.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316150010: Very well. This is sorcery with which I'm not entirely unfamiliar.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316150020: I'll be sure to incorporate it into one of your lessons.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316150030: Never lose that inquisitive spirit, my apprentice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316801010: That we should part ways in this manner...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316804000: My death would only be temporary.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316806010: Another moment of this, and no amount of grovelling will spare you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.316809000: For a time, I believed us kindred spirits.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318001000: If it isn't Nerijus. The Bloody Finger.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318001010: The end is nigh. For you, and your cessblood.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318010010: Well, you fought Nerijus and survived. That alone deserves commendation.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318010020: I am Yura. Hunter of Bloody Fingers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318010030: Tarnished held in thrall by cessblood. Zealots who stalk their own.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318010040: If you stay the path, you are certain to face more of them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318010050: Just remember. No kinship with their ilk remains. Their madness precludes it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318010060: Don't let your emotions stay your blade.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318010900: Well, you fought Nerijus and made good your escape. Fortune favours you, it seems.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318011010: There are other Tarnished, like me, who hunt the Bloody Fingers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318011020: If a Bloody Finger threatens you, use this ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318011030: If fortune takes your side, a hunter will come to your aid.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318013010: I am Yura, hunter of Bloody Fingers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318013020: Have you ever faced a Bloody Finger?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318013030: They are Tarnished held in thrall by cessblood. Zealots who stalk their own.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318013040: If you stay the path, you will face this blight, sooner or later.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318013050: Just remember. No kinship with their ilk remains. Their madness precludes it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318013060: Don't let your emotions stay your blade.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318014000: If fortune remains on your side, a hunter will come to your aid.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318015010: Stay clear of Agheel Lake. A great dragon roosts there.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318016010: Perhaps we will meet again, if fate permits.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318020010: Beware. A great dragon roosts at Agheel Lake.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318020020: And it's as fearsome as it is majestic.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318020030: So, unless you're mad, or wish to be burned alive...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318021000: Hmm, I gave you fair warning.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318021010: To stay clear of Agheel Lake, a known dragon roost.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318021020: Don't be a fool. Turn back, before it's too late.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318022000: Don't be a fool. Turn back, before it's too late.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318023010: To have fought Nerijus and lived, you must have seen your share of battle.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318023020: To have fought Nerijus and escaped, fortune must smile upon you indeed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318023030: I am Yura, as you might recall, hunter of Bloody Fingers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318023040: Tarnished held in thrall by cessblood. Zealots who stalk their own.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318023050: If you stay the path, you are certain to face more of them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318023060: Just remember. No kinship with their ilk remains. Their madness precludes it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318023070: Don't let your emotions stay your blade.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318024000: Ah, you must be the new Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318024010: You'd do well to steer clear of Agheel Lake, fledgling. A dragon roosts there...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318025010: Picking a fight with a dragon?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318025020: Well, I can tell you want to see it through.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318025030: Seems I'm forever crossing paths with hotheads like you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318026010: I am Yura, as you might recall, hunter of Bloody Fingers.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318026020: Tarnished held in thrall by cessblood. Zealots who stalk their own.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318026030: If you stay the path, you are certain to face more of them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318026040: Just remember. No kinship with their ilk remains. Their madness precludes it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318026050: Don't let your emotions stay your blade.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318027000: Ah, you must be the new Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318027010: And quite the fool, by the look of it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318027020: Picking a fight with a dragon? Hah.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318027030: Well, I can tell you want to see it through.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318027040: Seems I'm forever crossing paths with hotheads like you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318028000: I can tell you want to see it through.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318028010: Fools will be fools. Fight all the dragons you like.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318030000: There you are. That was my first dragon hunt in quite some time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318030010: Paired up with a hothead like you, it was just like old times.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318030040: Now that you've so impressively felled that dragon, there's something you should know.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318030050: That heart you brought back. It's used in Dragon Communion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318030060: If you should find yourself overcome by hunger for the heart, yearning for its strength,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318030070: then seek the decrepit church on the little island off the western coast.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318031010: Those who partake in Dragon Communion will one day shed their humanity.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318031020: Their hunger for dragon, their yearning, only worsens.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318031030: Until the floodgates burst, unleashing eternal torment.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318031040: The strength of a mighty dragon. Magnificent, but deadly.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318031050: It's no surprise that Dragon Communion is ruinous.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318032010: And as such, there's something you might like to know.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318034000: Ah, you must be the new Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318034010: That was my first dragon hunt in quite a while.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318034020: Paired up with a hothead like you, it was just like old times.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318034030: Now that you've so impressively felled that dragon, there's something you should know.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318034040: The heart you brought back. It's used in Dragon Communion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318034050: If you should find yourself overcome by hunger for the heart, yearning for its strength,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318034060: then seek the decrepit church on the little island off the western coast.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318035000: Ah, you must be the new Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318035020: And as such, there's something you might like to know.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318035030: That heart you brought back. It's used in Dragon Communion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318035040: If you should find yourself overcome by hunger for the heart, yearning for its strength,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318035050: then seek the decrepit church on the little island off the western coast.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318040000: Ah, oh, it's you. Thanks for your help there.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318040010: That Bloody Finger was a thorn in my side. And now I'm finally rid of him.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318040020: Here's a token of thanks. Please, take it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318041000: I may not have much time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318041010: I'm dying to see you, Eleonora... Violet Bloody Finger...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318042000: Yes, I've been tracking Eleonora for quite some time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318042010: She is the deadliest of all Bloody Fingers. She's felled many an old hand already.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318042020: But in spite of her cessblood zealotry, Eleonora is a proud knight.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318042030: If she comes for you, do not think twice. You must flee.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318042040: There is no shame in self-preservation.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318043010: Perhaps we will meet again, if fate permits.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318070000: Eleonora, it seems I am no match for you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318070010: But I've learned a thing or two myself, you see.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318070030: Please, please, Eleonora, yield to the cessblood no longer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318070040: Do not stain the immaculacy of your sword, your flesh, your fire...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318080010: The Tarnished, who would be Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318080020: Oh my, why the long face?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318080030: I fear that you were previously acquainted with this vessel.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318080040: Well, that is most unfortunate. For he is dead.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318080050: As for his flesh, he gave it to me, Shabriri.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318080060: I hope you can make your peace with that.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318081000: You are about to sacrifice something precious.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318081010: The life of a fair maiden, that you would toss into the fiery forge.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318081020: Only so that you may be Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318081030: What a horrible thing to ponder.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318081040: Your ascendency requires her sacrifice, whether she wishes it or not.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318081050: But how would the Lord, crowned so, be looked upon?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318082000: Chosen Tarnished and would-be Lord, dare to tread the path of true rigor.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318082010: Spare the poor girl, and singe your own flesh in her stead.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318082020: If you are prepared to show resolve,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318082030: and attain Lordship through righteous hardship,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318082040: then heed the words of I, Shabriri.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318083010: Descend into the depths, far below the Erdtree Capital.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318083020: Seek audience with the Three Fingers, and the flame of frenzy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318083030: If you inherit the flame of frenzy, your flesh will serve as kindling,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318083040: and the girl can be spared.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318083050: ...setting you on the righteous path of lordship.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318083060: The path of the Lord of Chaos.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318083070: Burn the Erdtree to the ground,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318083080: and incinerate all that divides and distinguishes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318083090: Ahh, may chaos take the world!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318084010: Descend into the depths, far below the Erdtree Capital.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318084020: Seek audience with the Three Fingers, and the flame of frenzy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318085000: Burn the Erdtree to the ground,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318085010: and incinerate all that divides and distinguishes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318085020: Ahh, may chaos take the world!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318801010: What do you stand to gain by challenging me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318802010: Well, if you've succumbed to cessblood...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318802020: it's better that I finish you here.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318803010: Your death could have been much worse.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318821010: Is this how you express contempt?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318822010: But if you do not care for Lordship,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318822020: I'm afraid you are of no use.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318823010: I did not take you for a fraud.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318824000: Shabriri is chaos incarnate. I cannot die.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318824010: Until we meet again, in another place or time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.318824020: Ahh, may chaos take the world!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319001010: Death has left its mark once again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319001020: I'm sorry, I cannot give you your proper rites...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319001030: But at least you did not join Those Who Live in Death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319001040: Your soul will return to the Erdtree, in time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319001050: Honeyed rays of gold, deliver this spirit.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319002010: I'm known as D. I hunt down Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319002030: The village here has been touched by Death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319002040: And worse yet, it is home to a mariner.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319002050: If you value your life, then go no further.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319003000: The village here has been touched by Death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319003010: Turn back, while you still can.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319010000: Another fool who won't listen to reason, eh?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319010010: But with a prowess for weeding Deathroot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319010030: How would you like to earn the strength of beasts?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319010040: If you're inclined to hunt more of Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319010050: then I'll introduce you to Gurranq, the beast clergyman.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319010060: I have a matter of my own to attend to.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319010070: And the beast himself wishes for someone to take my place.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319011000: Very well. Show me your map.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319011020: I've marked the location for you. Of a hidden gateway.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319011030: It will lead you to Gurranq, the beast clergyman.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319012000: I have a matter of my own to attend to.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319012010: I spotted the mark of the centipede here in the village.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319012020: An ill-omened symbol that should not be.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319012030: Someone, or something, threatens the sanctity of the Golden Order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319013000: What is it? Still milling about?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319013010: The map indicates where the gateway is hidden.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319013020: It will lead you to Gurranq, the beast clergyman.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319015000: What now? Had a change of heart?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319016010: With a prowess for weeding Deathroot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319016030: I'm known as D. I hunt down Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319016040: How would you like to earn the strength of beasts?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319016050: If you're inclined to hunt more of Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319016060: then I'll introduce you to Gurranq, the beast clergyman.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319016070: I have a matter of my own to attend to.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319016080: And the beast himself wishes for someone to take my place.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319020000: Ha! Prince of Death, take a good long look!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319020010: See the wrath of the Golden Order! The Order's justice, writ in blood!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319020020: This is what's become of your precious witch! Naught but expired meat and bone!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319020030: This is a proper death, O Prince!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319020040: Look at this rotten whore. No more children can be got from this useless flesh!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319020070: This is revenge, you witch! And you, you ghoul! This is the wrath of D!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319021010: The rotten witch is dead. The Golden Order, unsullied.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319021020: Now I can look my brother Darian in the eye.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319021030: Honeyed rays of gold, deliver my spirit.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319022000: Darian, now I have no regrets.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319022010: Honeyed rays of gold, deliver my spirit.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319032020: I require the sword...and raiment...of D...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319033020: Soon you will know, filthy witch...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319033030: Soon you will know... Vengeance for Darian.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319120010: I'm known as D. I hunt down Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319120030: Those Who Live in Death should be left well alone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319120040: All the more, should you spy a mariner among their number.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319120050: Unless you wish to lay down your life in vain.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319121000: Those Who Live in Death should be left well alone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319121010: All the more, should you spy a mariner among their number.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319122010: I'm glad you took my warning to heart.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319122020: Those Who Live in Death should be left well alone.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319122030: All the more, should you spy a mariner among their number.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319130010: Another fool who won't listen to reason, eh?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319130020: But with a prowess for weeding Deathroot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319130030: With a prowess for weeding Deathroot.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319130050: How would you like to earn the strength of beasts?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319130060: If you're inclined to hunt more of Those Who Live in Death, and weed their Deathroot,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319130070: then I'll introduce you to Gurranq, the beast clergyman.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319130080: I have a matter of my own to attend to.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319130090: And the beast himself wishes for someone to take my place.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319131000: Very well. Show me your map.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319131020: I've marked the location for you. Of a hidden gateway.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319131030: It will lead you to Gurranq, the beast clergyman.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319132000: I have a matter of my own to attend to.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319132010: I've spotted the mark of the centipede.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319132020: An ill-omened symbol that should not be.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319132030: Someone, or something, threatens the sanctity of the Golden Order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319133000: What is it? Still milling about?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319133010: The map indicates where the gateway is hidden.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319133020: It will lead you to Gurranq, the beast clergyman.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319135000: What's wrong? Got cold feet, have you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319140000: You've met Gurranq, I take it?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319140010: Then owing to our duties shared, we are now comrades-in-arms.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319140030: The power of the Golden Order, to aid the hunt of Those Who Live in Death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319142000: Ah, hello there. What can I do for you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319143000: Ah, hello. You've been busy weeding Deathroot, I take it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319143010: I thank you, as your brother-in-arms.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319143020: So what can I do for you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319144010: You haven't gone to see Gurranq yet, have you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319144020: Well, no rush. You do as you please.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319144030: Just as long as he doesn't starve to death, eh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319145000: Go to Gurranq only if you feel the time is right.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319145010: Killing Those Who Live in Death and weeding their Deathroot...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319145020: Is a path not to be trod without ample resolve.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319150010: That I might put this crooked land to rights.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319150020: Following only the guidance of the great Elden Ring.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319150030: Those Who Live in Death fall outside the principles of the Golden Order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319150040: Their mere existence sullies the guidance of gold. Tainting its truth.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319150050: And so it is the vermin must be exterminated... Down to the very last.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319151000: Are you acquainted with a man named Rogier?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319151010: You know, the piteous fellow hiding away on the balcony?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319151020: He was a formidable spellblade, in times past.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319151030: Don't let his easy air deceive you. He was wise beyond his years, stout of heart and clear of mind.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319151050: You see him now, ravaged by thorns, muttering and rambling...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319151060: Like he's half dead already. I can't stomach to watch.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319151080: That's how you end up, when seduced by Those Who Live in Death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319151090: When grace is sullied, it rots people from the inside. Breaks them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319152010: How did you get your hands on that dagger?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319152040: I know very well whose dagger it is.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319152050: Why don't I return it to them for you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319152060: Good work, bringing this to me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319800020: Unless you want to die like a dog?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319801010: Honeyed rays of gold, deliver this spirit.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319802000: I swear, there's a blight spreading amongst the Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319811020: A defiler of the Golden Order, and murderer of my brother!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319811040: I'll grind your corpse into that vile wench's rotting remains.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319811050: A witch's eternal embrace, just as you wished!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.319812000: You defiled cretin. My brother is now avenged!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320001010: Everyone who came with me. They crossed the sea for me. They fought, for me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320001030:
Only to have their arms taken. Their legs taken. Even their heads...taken.
Taken and stuck to the spider.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320001040: Did you know? If you're grafted by the spider, you become a chrysalid.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320001050: It's quite the lark, when you think about it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320002000: You're all on your own, are you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320002020: Enticed by the one in the white mask, I suppose. Oh, you've come to be one with the spider?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320002030: Well, that makes us two peas in a pod.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320002040: But I don't have your courage.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320002050: It's scary, you know. Having your arms cut off. Or legs. Or your head.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320002060: I want to be like everyone else, but I'm just too scared.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320003010: Can you take this little one along with you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320003020: Can you take these little ones along with you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320003030: The poor thing deserves someone braver than myselfâ€¦
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320003040: And the spirits look rather fondly upon you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320003050: It'll be glad of your company, I think, the little'un.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320003060: They'd be glad of your company, I think, the little'uns.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320003900: The poor things deserve someone braver than myselfâ€¦
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320005000: It was a pleasure to see you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320005010: Oh, can you pass on a message for me, if you see the little chrysalids in Stormveil Castle?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320005020: Tell them I love them. And that despite my craven heart, I'm sure I'll be joining their club soon enough.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320005030: I'm finally getting the hang of this whole "pain" thing, you know.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320014010: Did you give the little chrysalids the message?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320014020: That I love them. And that despite my craven heart, I'm sure I'll be joining their club soon enough.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320020010: They all thought I'd make something of myself. Me! Who can't do anything...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320020020: I think I'll head to the Roundtable Hold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320020030: Perhaps I'll find my purpose there.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320021000: I think I'll head to the Roundtable Hold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320021010: Perhaps I'll find my purpose there.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320030000: Greetings. Nice to see you again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320030010: My name is Roderika. I should have told you sooner.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320030030: The Roundtable Hold, covert quarters of the Two Fingers, and gathering place of champions who vie to become Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320030040: I never knew the guidance bestowed upon us Tarnished had such fantastic roots.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320030050: Although, it's all a bit much for me, in truth.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320030060: I'm still looking for my own purpose.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320032000: You're telling me I possess some kind of gift?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320032020: If I do have this talent, and goodness knows it would be my first...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320032030: I suppose I should try to hone it. Shouldn't I?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320032040: I'll ask Master Hewg to teach me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320032050: Certainly, he does appear intimidating, and holds no love for us Tarnished...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320032060: But I know he's trapped here, at the Roundtable Hold... So...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320032070: I can tell. He's a gentle soul, underneath it all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320033010: Please, allow to me to express my thanks.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320033020: For giving me that keepsake from my men.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320033030: It was as if I was frozen with self-pity. I failed them at every turn.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320033040: You have my gratitude. Please, take this.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320034010: My name is Roderika. I'm a recent arrival.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320034030: The Roundtable Hold, covert quarters of the Two Fingers, and gathering place of champions who vie to become Elden Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320034040: I never knew the guidance bestowed upon us Tarnished had such fantastic roots.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320034050: Although, it's all a bit much for me, in truth.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320034060: I'm still looking for my own purpose.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320035000: It's all a bit much for me, in truth.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320035010: I'm still looking for my own purpose.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320036020: I'm still looking for my own purpose.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320036030: It's not easy, by any means, but it's what I must do.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320037000: If I do have a talent for spirit tuning, and goodness knows that would be a surpriseâ€¦
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320037010: I suppose I should try to hone it. Shouldn't I?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320037020: I'll ask Master Hewg to teach me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320040000: Good to see you again. Thank you very much!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320040010: I have you to thank, don't I? For persuading Master Hewg?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320040020: I can happily announce that he has taught me the noble toil of spirit tuning.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320040030: I'm as yet unsure of what I might be able to accomplish,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320040040: but if I might be any help to you all, I'd certainly like to try.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320040050: And if there's any chance to ease the suffering of my dear men who were grafted...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320040070: Roderika the spirit tuner prentice. Pleased to make your acquaintance.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320050010: Are you here for spirit tuning?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320051000: I feel like I'm really coming to grips with spirit tuning of late.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320051010: I can see how and why immortal essence exists as spirit under the Golden Order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320051020: I can understand their yearnings, what they become drawn to...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320051030: Master Hewg said it himself, actually, that I'm no mere prentice any longer.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320051050: Once again, I'm pleased to make your acquaintance. Roderika the certified spirit tuner.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320052000: I'd like to ask you a small favour.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320052010: Can you take this little one along with you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320052020: Can you take these little ones along with you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320052040: But the spirits look rather fondly upon you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320052050: It'll be glad of your company, I think, the little'un.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320052060: They'd be glad of your company, I think, the little'uns.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320053000: I need to warn you about something.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320053010: A little while ago someone started lurking in the wing on the opposite side of the roundtable.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320053020: And I can hear, from all the way over there...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320053030: The howling and wailing of spirits in fear of a curse. I can even hear the repulsive, twisted malison itself...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320053040: A plethora of spirits in an unceasing cacophony...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320053050: I can't even imagine. How much suffering, inflicted to who knows how many souls...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320053060: Not even the grafting caused anything like this to happen...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320053080: I know you're strong, but please...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320054000: I can hear it from across the wing, past the roundtable...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320054010: The howling and wailing of spirits in fear of the curse. I can even hear the repulsive, twisted malison itself...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320054030: I know you're strong, but please...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320055000: I can't hear them any more; the voices of the spirits cowering from the curse...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320055010: I suppose the Dung Eater must have left the Roundtable.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320055020: I just pray nothing ill comes of this.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320056000: Be on your guard, I beg you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320056010: He's back. The Dung Eater. Again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320056020: I can hear them; the spirits as they howl and lament in fear of the curse.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320056030: And worse than ever, the reverberations of the twisted malison itself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320056040: But after all this time, I've started to grasp it now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320056050: I can hear, in the malison, another fearsome Order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320057000: The voices of the tormented spirits are silent again..
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320057010: But it isn't like last time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320057020: I'm almost certain...the spirits have escaped their confinement.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320057030: Did you...have anything to do with it, I wonder?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320060000: Take a look around. The Roundtable Hold is burned. Razed to the ground.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320060010: The Two Fingers went mad, and the Tarnished have all left.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320060020: Myself and Master Hewg are the only ones who remain.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320060030: Don't worry, I don't blame you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320060040: I'll continue spirit tuning just the same as before.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320060050: Which is why I need your help persuading Master Hewg to leave.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320060060: His roots are so knotted in this place.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320060070: He won't last much longer if he stays here...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320060080: His shackles are broken. He's a free man, now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320060090: It's high time he put the Roundtable behind him.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320061000: I see. You're here for some spirit tuning?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320070010: So Master Hewg won't listen to you, either.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320070030: I'll try and talk him round next time.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320070040: I know he was given this great entreaty;
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320070050: To craft a weapon which could slay a god. Though I can't help but think of it as a curse.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320070060: A fearsome curse, put on him by Queen Marika.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320070070: And if that's the case, I'm not sure there's anything we can do...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320080000: Ah. So it wasn't just me this happened to...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320080010: To think he'd forget who you were, as well.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320080020: I knew he'd burn himself out, old Hewg.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320080030: I think we could talk him into leaving the Roundtable Hold, now.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320080040: But maybe it's better that we don't.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320080050: It's only proper that we respect his choice to stay.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320081010: He made me who I am today.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320081020: I'd like to return the kindness, in whatever small way I can.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320082010: Hewg was always saying that you were a Lord, to him.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320082020: So slay her, with the weapons he smithed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320082030: Slay the god, Marika, who cursed us all.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320090020: I'm no longer a child. It's about time I took this step.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320800000: You're willing to make me a chrysalid?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320801000: Ah, but I'm still a milksop craven...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320801010: I can't even govern myself to step beyond the bounds of this ward...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320802000: Please. You're only wasting your strength.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320803000: I know how you must feel.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320804000: Or are you like me? You're so far out of your mind with fear...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320804010: You've divested yourself of all reason?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.320805010: Even if you persist, your fear will not abate.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321001010: Someone who might be interested in rescuing the great Kenneth Haight?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321001020: Servant to the true Order, and celebrated repudiator of the false!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321003000: What are you waiting for? A kiss goodbye?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321003010: My fort lies to the south, beyond the Mistwood. Take it back for me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321003020: Oh I see. You wish to know the reward?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321003030: Fret not, the great Kenneth Haight is known for his considerable largesse.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321003040: The celebrations will be lavish indeed, upon the dawn of my fort's retrieval.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321004000: Hmph, yes, now allow me to furnish you with a little advice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321004010: I would take great care to avoid Godrick's Tarnished hunts, were I in your shoes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321004020: That depraved lot are obsessed with sacrificing Tarnished like you for the sake of "grafting".
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321004030: Honestly, Godrick's nothing more than a jumped up country bumpkin. Lord? Don't make me laugh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321004040: First he hid himself amongst the womenfolk to flee the capital, then hid from Radahn in that castle...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321004050: Then he insulted Malenia, lost to her in battle, only to lick her boots rather than die like a man.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321004060: Has he no shame, the big girl's blouse?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321004070: And to think, he's the blood of Godfrey! Last of the golden lineage, though you almost wouldn't know it to look at him.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321004080: I almost feel sorry for the chap the more I think of it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321005000: What are you waiting for? A kiss goodbye?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321005010: My fort lies to the south, beyond the Mistwood. Take it back for me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321010000: Ah, you've come to lend me your aid, have you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321010010: Well, that's very kind, but, um...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321010020: No, no. Th-the help is very much appreciated. Even from a Tarnished.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321010030: Despite appearances, nobility is no prerequisite to serving the true Order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321010040: You might have heard of me. Kenneth Haight. Next in line as the rightful ruler of Limgrave.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321010050: Young Tarnished, I would have a boon of you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321010060: I want you to take back my fort. It lies to the south, beyond the Mistwood.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321010070: A Knight commander from Stormveil took it. A fool, and plumb mad to boot. Simply obsessed with blood!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321014010: Remarkable! The Knight Commander, dead. Already!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321014020: A blessing, if ever I chanced upon one.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321014030: Fine work, I say, fine work, indeed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321014040: I doubt that it was your intention, but the deed is done, and I commend you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321014060: Go on, it is yours, for the keeping.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321020000: Ah-ha! I've been waiting for you with baited breath!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321020010: Did you manage to recapture my fort?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321020020: Oh excellent news, just wonderful. And the knight's dead to boot!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321020030: Well done my friend, well done indeed!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321020040: I knew I was right to trust you!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321020050: Now, here's your reward, as promised.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321021000: Right then. Time for me to head to the fort.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321021010: I've much to do. First I'll have to reestablish communication with the demi-humans.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321021020: What's that look? You don't believe me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321021030: Well, under the Erdtree, commingling with the demi-humans is made possible.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321021040: Even the vulgar shall not be left behind, under the rule of true Order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321021050: Which is why I, Kenneth Haight, next in line as the rightful ruler of Limgrave, have sworn to uphold it.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321021060: Just you watch, my friend. Just you watch.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321022000: Ah, yes. I've been meaning to ask.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321022010: Would you like to enter my service?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321022020: I see bright things in your future, stout warrior.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321022030: Enter into my service and learn the workings of the Erdtree's true Order.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321022040: And who knows, perhaps some time down the line, the grace of gold will return to those Tarnished eyes of yours.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321022050: What say you? A fine accord, is it not?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321023010: I knew I saw something in you.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321023020: I shall await you at my fort.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321023030: We shall hold the ceremony for your knighting there, I think.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321023040: I see great things ahead of us. We are truly by the Erdtree blessed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321024010: Such foolishness have I never seen!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321024020: Well...not that I can't sympathise with your choice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321024030: Such a miraculous manifestation of felicity is like to startle one such as yourself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321024040: Should you change your mind, do visit me at my fort.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321025000: What is it? Have you put your misgivings to rest?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321026000: Well...not that I can't sympathise with your choice.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321026010: Such a miraculous manifestation of felicity is like to startle one such as yourself.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321026020: Oh don't fret, there's no hurry.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321026030: Should you change your mind, do visit me at my fort.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321040010: Why the queen... Now all hope is...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321050010: I suppose you must have seen it by now, yes, the sorry state of my fort?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321050020: Oh, indeed, it is a foul fate for a land, to be without a ruler.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321050030: One must be found, with haste. And not that awful Godrick.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321050040: But a true and stalwart Lord of the proper lineage to take the reigns of Limgrave.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321051000: I am sorry to have lifted your hopes...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321051010: But I haven't the authority to raise you to knighthood as things stand.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321051020: The great Kenneth Haight issues his sincerest apology.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321051030: But now, I must begin my search post-haste.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321051040: For a true and stalwart Lord of the proper lineage to take the reigns of Limgrave.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321052000: I must begin my search post-haste.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321052010: For a true and stalwart Lord of the proper lineage to take the reigns of Limgrave.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321060000: Ah, nice to see you after so long.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321060010: Safe and sound, I take it, yes? Good.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321060020: Ah, quite. I have indeed selected a new ruler.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321060030: Lady Nepheli is strong and just. Worthy of the burden of Limgrave's lineage.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321060040: Such is the sincere opinion of I, Kenneth Haight, no less.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321060050: For the time being, I share command of the castle with my Lady, but I plan on returning to my fort afterwards.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321060060: At which time I can fulfil my old promise.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321060070: By raising you to the glory of knighthood.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321060080: I hope it is just as wonderful as you imagine.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321061000: For the time being, I share command of the castle with my Lady, but I plan on returning to my fort afterwards.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321061010: At which time I can fulfil my old promise.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321061020: By raising you to the glory of knighthood.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321061030: I hope it is just as wonderful as you imagine.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321802010: I am Kenneth Haight, and I have seen quite enough!
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321803010: I fear for the integrity of the Order...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.321804010: O Erdtree, why have you forsaken me...?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322001000: Greetings, great champion called by grace.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322001020: Circumstances have compelled my stay at the Roundtable Hold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322001030: Great champion, would you allow me to hold you, but briefly?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322001040: Perhaps you might share with me some of your lifely vigour, and your stout-heartedness.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322001050: Doing so will grant me the warmth of a champion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322001060: And you, I am sure, will bear a baldachin's blessing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322001070: Do you think it vulgar, perhaps?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322001080: Where I come from, it is a sacred act.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322002020: What you felt light up inside you was a baldachin's blessing.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322002030: Though it is but a fleeting thing, I am afraid.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322002040: Come back to me, should you require another.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322002050: I will take you in my arms as often as you need.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322003020: But should you change your mind...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322004010: Had a change of heart already?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322005000: I am pleased to see you again.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322005010: Would you like me to hold you, once more?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322005020: The blessing is still aflame in your breast, dear.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322005030: Would you like to be held, regardless?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322007000: Then good day to you, my dear.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322020000: I was known as a Deathbed Companion, where I come from.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322020010: After I received the warmth and lifely vigour from a number of champions,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322020020: I lay with the remains of an exalted noble, to grant him another chance at life.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322020030: To do so is the purpose of my being.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322020040: But before I could bear the noble into new life,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322020050: I was awakened by the guidance of grace, and chased from my birthplace.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322020070: Despite all that, I still wish to be a Deathbed Companion.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322020080: So please, let me hold you like this, as often as it takes.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322021010: Might I ask something of you?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322021020: Could you please find the owner of this dagger, and return it to them?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322021030: A certain person gave it to me, as a gift.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322021040: It's a very precious thing. It must have a special place in the owner's heart.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322021050: So I would like for the original owner to have it back, if you wouldn't mind.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322022000: I'd like you to find the owner of the dagger I gave you, and return it to them.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322022010: It's a very precious thing. It must have a special place in the owner's heart.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322023010: Have you ever heard of black knifeprints?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322023020: Dear Rogier likes to talk of them when abed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322023030: And the ancient plot, in which the first of the Demigods was slain.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322023040: The black knives wielded by the assassins who committed the act,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322023050: along with the impressions they made, somehow hide the truth of the conspiracy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322023060: These grand affairs are hardly my fortÃ©...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322023070: But dear Rogier began to weep as he spoke...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322024000: Dear Rogier likes to talk of it when abed.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322024010: The ancient plot, in which the first of the Demigods was slain.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322024020: The black knives wielded by the assassins who committed the act,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322024030: along with the impressions they made, somehow hide the truth of the conspiracy.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322025000: I heard that you lent a hand to dear Rogier.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322025020: He must be possessed of great mental fortitude.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322025030: It anchors his will, and sustains him, despite his grievous wounds.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322025050: To dear Rogier, and myself, too.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322027000: In truth I've heard tell from someone else,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322027010: about the black knifeprints that fascinate dear Rogier so.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322027020: But It wouldn't be right to give this to him, stuck as he is in the Roundtable Hold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322027030: Perhaps you could make use of it?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322030000: Finally, it is returned to its rightful place.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322030010: The stolen hallowbrand, of the exalted noble.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322030020: And now, I must bid you goodbye as well.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322030030: Though I ask you deliver this message to the Roundtable Hold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322030050: Hark, Roundtable. Disturb not the Death of Godwyn, the exalted.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322030060: We, who humbly live in Death...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322030070: Live in waiting, to one day welcome our Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322030080: What right does anyone have to object?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322030090: Our Lord will rise. The Lord of the many, and the meek.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322040030: To deny us, and our ways?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322040040: Like the dogmatic brutes of the Golden Order?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322041000: I see. Then you must kill me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322041010: For I am the companion of Godwyn, Prince of Death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322041020: I wished to be a mother to Those Who Live in Death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322041030: So it is, that any loathing, any hatred that overshadows them...
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322041040: I must bear, as a matter of duty, with my own flesh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322042010: You deny us, do you not?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322042020: Because we deign to live in Death, and wish our Lord to rise to glory.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322043010: I am the guardian of Those Who Live in Death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322043020: They call me a foul and rotten witch.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322043030: Yet you still wish to be held by me?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322044000: I will soon lay with Godwyn.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322044010: And it will surely stir within me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322044020: the new life of the golden prince, and first Dead of the demigods,
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322044030: as the rune of Those Who Live in Death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322044040: Please, do one thing for me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322044050: Brandish this child, my rune, and take for yourself the throne.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322044060: Stay the persecution of Those Who Live in Death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322045000: I will soon lay with Godwyn.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322045010: To conceive my child, the rune.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322045020: Brandish my rune, and take for yourself the throne.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322045030: Stay the persecution of Those Who Live in Death.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322046020: I choose to lie with Godwyn of my own will. Not the remains of one chosen for me.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322046030: And I will bear a child.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322046040: Who will inherit your warmth, too.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322046050: What greater blessing could there be, but to be born a Deathbed Companion?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322051000: Have you ever seen a hallowbrand?
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322051010: When the first of the demigods died, his flesh was marked with the half-wheel wound of the centipede.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322051020: Godwyn's hallowbrand has since been recovered at the Roundtable Hold.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322051030: But there is another hallowbrand out there somewhere.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322051050: Before the time comes we receive our Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322052000: When Godwyn died, a hallowbrand scored his flesh.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322052010: But another exists. Another mark in the shape of the half-wheel wound of the centipede.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322052030: Before the time comes we receive our Lord.
N:\\GR\\data\\INTERROOT_win64\\msg\\engU.322052040: My hands will be dirtied once more by the deed.
